Quest.Title: Rat Hazard
Quest.Description: Seriy and Tolyan were watching the military when rats suddenly attacked them. Tolyan is dead. Seriy is injured. Now he desires to clear the area of all the rats.

Quest.Title: Rat Hazard
Quest.Description: Find Tolyan's dead body near the south tunnel (square A2,4). Rats are still shewing his bones. Kill at least 5 of them.
Quest.onWin: The task completed. Seriy will be glad to know that the mutants that killed his friend are dead.

Quest.Title: Rat hazard
Quest.Description: Seriy will be glad to know that the mutants are dead.

Quest.onFailed: You left the station without killing all rats for Seriy.

Quest.Title: Dangerous Neighborhood
Quest.Description: Killing mutated rats outside the station will make the area much safer.

Quest.Title: Bloody Rats
Quest.onFailed: You've lest the area before completing the task for Seryi.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat Tail
Quest.Description: One man at the station buys up mutant rat tails.
Find big mutant rats. Seryi says they might be near the swamp (square Б1-1).
Quest.onFailed: You've left the area without selling the tail.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat's Tail
Quest.Description: Sell the tail.

Quest.Title: Daily Routine
Quest.Description: Talk to Seryi again, he'll give you a multiple task.

Quest.Title: Movement
Quest.Description: Use the "mouse" to look around.
Use the WASD keys to move and dodge in different directions.

Quest.Title: Who else survived?
Quest.Description: Talk to the soldier who also survived in the accident.
Press "F" to interact with people and objects.

Quest.Title: Interaction with objects
Quest.Description: Press "F" to interact with an object.
The Zone is a dangerous place. You need to find a weapon.
Click the left mouse button to fire.
Hold down the "Right Mouse Button" to aim.
To reload a weapon or to distort jammed lock, press "R". A broken weapon will jam more often.

Quest.Title: Running
Quest.Description: Press and hold "Shift" to run. The player is not able to run when he is hungry, restore his hunger level first.

Quest.Title: Interaction
Quest.Description: You can interact with objects and characters by pressing the "F" key.
Move the cross to a corpse (the gear icon will appear) and press "F" to examine it.

Quest.Title: Talk to Misha Koshegarov.
Quest.Description: Talk to Misha Koshegarov.

Quest.Title: Find the station
Quest.Description: If you go along railways, you'll reach the railroad station. There are people who can help you.
The station marked with an icon on the Zone map. To open the map, choose "GPS map" button on the screen. Or use the shortkey "M".

This is the map of Zone. Use the "arrow" buttons to scroll the map and "zoom in \ out" buttons to zoom. You can also hold down the "Left Mouse Button" for scrolling and use the mouse wheel to zoom. Press the ESC button to close the map.

Quest.Title: Mutant RatTail
Quest.Description: The byer at the station wil purchase a big mutant rat tail. You'll find big rats in the square Б1-1.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat's Tail.
Quest.Description: Sell the tail to the buyer.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat's Tail
Quest.onFailed: You left the area without selling the tail.

Quest.Title: Interaction
Quest.Description: Pvt. Osechkin said that one of the trucks had a crate with weapons. Look around crash site and find this crate.
Use the "F" key to interact with people and objects.

Quest.Title: Multiple Tasks
Quest.Description: You can repeat multiple tasks. Some of them can be repeated right after being completed.

Quest.Title: Firing
Quest.Description: Click the left mouse button to fire.
Hold down the "Right Mouse Button" to aim.
To reload a weapon or to distort jammed lock, press "R". A broken weapon will jam more often.

Quest.Title: Flashlight
Quest.Description: To see in dark places, use a flashlight by pressing "L" key.

Quest.Title: Talk to the Station Sentry
Quest.Description: Talk to the station sentry.
You entered urchins territory.
To pick up a rat tail, come near the urchin corpse and press the "X" key. Usually you need to kill several enemies to find a valuable item.
Now you can sell the tail. Remember to collect mutants' body parts. Something may be sold at a very high price.

Quest.Title: Jumps
Quest.Description: Press the SPACE key to jump. You can jump over some obstacles by moving forward and pressing SPACE. Jumping consumes an endurance bar, located in the upper left corner of the screen.

You took a quest. To open your journal, hold down the CTRL key (the cursor will appear on the screen) and choose the "Journal" button on the screen. Or use the hotkey ("J"). To close the journal, press the ESC key.

Quest.Title: Interaction with people
Quest.Description: Come up to the person you want to talk to, you'll see a special icon .
Press "F" to interact.

Quest.Title: Repairman
Quest.Description: You can repair broken items by speaking with a repairman.
Move the cursor on a broken item (the cursor will change form into a wrench) and press the "Left Mouse Button". Repair cost depends on the item condition.

Quest.Title: Ratcatcher
Quest.Description: Station Watchman asked you to kill some mutant rats to the southwest of the station, in the center of the squares A2-2 and B1-3. (Map of the area can be opened by pressing the "M")

Quest.Title: Rat Hazard
Quest.Description: Kill 5 mutant rats near the station.
Quest.onWin: The task completed. Go back to Station Watchman.

Quest.Description: You killed the rats as you promised. Tell Station Watchman about it.

Quest.Title: Looking for Charon
Quest.Description: Station Watchman told you to find a man named Charon. He lives in a hut in the swamp.
Charon will help you to get to Liubech. You'll find his hut near the north tunnel.
Quest.onWin: Charon's dead. Let Station Watchman know about it.

Quest.Description: Charon is dead. Let Station Watchman know about it.

You took a quest. To open your journal, hold down the CTRL key (the cursor will appear on the screen) and choose the "Journal" button on the screen. Or use the shortcut ("J"). To close the journal, press ESC.
Charon's hut is marked on the map. Press "M" to open the map.

This is the map of Zone. Use the "arrow" buttons to scroll the map and "zoom in \ out" buttons to zoom. You can also hold down the "Left Mouse Button" for scrolling and use the mouse wheel to zoom. Press the ESC button to close the map.
Now you have a weapon.

Quest.Title: Travel to the station.
Quest.Description: If you go along railways, you'll reach the railroad station. There are people who can help you.

This is the map of Zone. Use the "arrow" buttons to scroll the map and "zoom in \ out" buttons to zoom. You can also hold down the "Left Mouse Button" for scrolling and use the mouse wheel to zoom. Press the ESC button to close the map.
The station marked by an icon on the Zone map. To open the map, choose "GPS map" button on the screen. Or use the shortkey "M".

Quest.Title: Traders
Quest.Description: You can buy new equipment and additional ammo from traders. Money can be earned by completing quests and by selling parts of mutants to buyers.

Quest.Title: Traders
Quest.Description: You can buy new equipment and additional ammo from traders. Money can be earned by completing quests and by selling parts of mutants to buyers.

To sell or buy stuff, move an item either from your backpack or trader's bag into the trade window. The cost will appear below. Press "Confirm" or "Clear" to confirm or cancel the action. Press Esc to close the trade window.

To sell or buy stuff, move an item either from your backpack or trader's bag into the trade window. The cost will appear below. Press "Confirm" or "Clear" to confirm or cancel the action. Press Esc to close the trade window.

To sell or buy stuff, move an item either from your backpack or trader's bag into the trade window. The cost will appear below. Press "Confirm" or "Clear" to confirm or cancel the action. Press Esc to close the trade window.

Quest.Title: Doctor
Quest.Description: Doctors, healers and pharmacists sell medications needed for restoring health points.

Quest.Title: First Med kit
Quest.Description: Get your first med kit.

Quest.Title: Healing
Quest.Description: A health bar is indicated on the top left corner of the screen. You lose health points if you take damage. When there's no health points left, the player dies.
Med kits restore health. To use it, open the "Inventory" (I), click the right mouse button on the med kit and press "Use".
For quick use of med kits (and other items), drag them to the quick-slots panel in the bottom of the screen. On the top of the slot, you can see the keyboard key which will activate the item.
Open your backpack and equipment by holding down the CTRL key and pressing "Backpack" (shortkey "I") and "Equipment" (shortkey "U") buttons on the screen.
(тайник Серого в дренажной трубе)
(ящик из грузовика)

Quest.Title: Find a weapon
Quest.Description: позволяет с 3х тайников одновременно НЕ получить пистолет и зарегистрировать факт находки в первом из найденных

Quest.Title: Devil Piglets
Quest.Description: Ahmed asked you to kill ten boars and bring him their legs as trophy.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Dr. Dolittle asked you to analyze mutational changes of rats in the square А6. He almost begged you not to kill any rats on the way.

item.title: Анализатор Айболита
item.description: Анализатор Айболита, предназначенный для сбора информации о живых мутантах. Отслеживает движения. Улавливает сердцебиение на ближних дистанциях. Способен распознавать звуки и запахи. Собранные данные хранит на встроенной флеш-памяти. Прибор настроен на жизненные показатели крысы-мутанта.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Find the military base in square A6.
Quest.onWin: You can start the experiment. Activate the analyzer scanner.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Activate the analyzer scanner.
Quest.onWin: The analyzer scanner is activated.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Wait till the analyzer collects all the data.
Quest.onWin: The analyzer successfully collected data. Come back to Dr. Dolittle.

item.title: Анализатор с данными
item.description: Анализатор Айболита, предназначенный для сбора информации о живых мутантах. Отслеживает движения. Улавливает сердцебиение на ближних дистанциях. Способен распознавать звуки и запахи. Собранные данные хранит на встроенной флеш-памяти. Прибор настроен на жизненные показатели крысы-мутанта.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: You need to stay in the zone of the experiment. Don't leave the place.
Quest.onFailed: You left the zone of the experiment. The experiment is failed.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Return to Dr. Dolittle and give him the analyzer with the collected data.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Dr. Dolittle asked you not to kill rats while doing the research.
Quest.onFailed: You've killed a rat. Dr. Dolittle didn't want rats to be hurt.

Quest.Title: Caring about fauna
Quest.Description: With the analyzer it's possible now to study rats without hurting them.

item.title: Анализатор Айболита
item.description: Анализатор Айболита, предназначенный для сбора информации о живых мутантах. Отслеживает движения. Улавливает сердцебиение на ближних дистанциях. Способен распознавать звуки и запахи. Собранные данные хранит на встроенной флеш-памяти. Прибор настроен на жизненные показатели крысы-мутанта.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Return to Patisson.
Quest.onWin: You can start the experiment. Activate the analyzer scanner.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Activate the analyzer scanner.
Quest.onWin: The analyzer scanner is activated.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Wait till the analyzer collects all the data.
Quest.onWin: The analyzer has successfully collected data. Come back to Dr. Dolittle.

item.title: Анализатор с данными
item.description: Анализатор Айболита, предназначенный для сбора информации о живых мутантах. Отслеживает движения. Улавливает сердцебиение на ближних дистанциях. Способен распознавать звуки и запахи. Собранные данные хранит на встроенной флеш-памяти. Прибор настроен на жизненные показатели крысы-мутанта.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: You need to stay in the zone of the experiment. Don't leave the place.
Quest.onFailed: You left the zone of the experiment. The experiment is failed.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Return to Dr. Dolittle and give him the analyzer with the collected data.

Quest.Title: Greenpeace approves
Quest.Description: Dr. Dolittle asked you not to kill any rats while doing the research.
Quest.onFailed: You've killed a rat. Dr. Dolittle didn't want rats to be hurt.

Quest.Title: Alcohol for Pivovarov
Quest.Description: Barman Pivovarov containing a bar in a cellar of the distillery. He asked to bring him 10 bottles of alcohol to refill his running low stocks.

Quest.Title: Deliver vacuum tubes
Quest.Description: Deliver new vacuum tubes.

item.title: Радиолампа
item.description: Новая лампа для военной рации.

Quest.Title: Give the Vacuum Tubes Away
Quest.Description: Hand the new tube to corporal Druz. The corporal's post is in the northeast corner of square З12.
Quest.onWin: Corporal Druz took the vacuum tube.

Quest.Title: Give the Vacuum Tubes Away
Quest.Description: Hand the new tube to corporal Kazakov. The corporal's post is located to the southwest of the corporal Druz's post, in square З12.
Quest.onWin: Corporal Kazakov took the vacuum tube.

Quest.Title: Give the Vacuum Tubes Away
Quest.Description: Hand the new tube to corporal Kvashina. Kvashina's post is the southern post, it's on a border of squares З12 and З13, near the militia station.
Quest.onWin: Corporal Kvashina took the vacuum tube.

Quest.Title: Give the Vacuum Tubes Away
Quest.Description: Tell the Courier all tubes are in their places.

Quest.Title: Talk to Bald
Quest.Description: Basmach promised to carry out an educational work with Bald. Now Bald should remember about his debt.
Take a fake package from Alex.

item.title: Фальшивая посылка
item.description: Палка ждет эту посылку у входа в здание милиции. Но внутри не настоящий товар, а копия, над которой потрудился Алекс.

Quest.Title: Tools for the Foreman
Quest.Description: One Foreman needs a blowtorch, an insulating tape, a gasoline lighter and a steel scalpel for his work. Give all the stuff to Muddy.

Quest.Title: Tools for the Foreman
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs at least one working blowtorch.

Quest.Title: Tools for the Foreman
Quest.Description: The Foreman also needs an insulating tape.

Quest.Title: Tools for the Foreman
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs a gasoline lighter to finish his work.

Quest.Title: Tools for the Foreman
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs one steel scalpel.

Quest.Title: More tools
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs more materials and tools.

Quest.Title: More Tools
Quest.Description: The Foreman asked you to get him one roll of copper wire.

Quest.Title: More Tools
Quest.Description: The Foreman also needs five packs of steel balls.

Quest.Title: More Tools
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs one threaded short pipe.

Quest.Title: More Tools
Quest.Description: Get a set of special repair tools. You may find it at the repairman's in Gourmet or in the Bandit Cave.

Quest.Title: More Tools
Quest.Description: Get two coils of insulating tape.

Quest.Title: Delicate work
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs your help again.

Quest.Title: Delicate Work
Quest.Description: Get a surgery scalpel.

Quest.Title: Delicate Work
Quest.Description: Get a piece of canvas.

Quest.Title: Delicate Work
Quest.Description: Get hydrogen peroxide.

Quest.Title: Delicate Work
Quest.Description: Get a flask of spider venom.

Quest.Title: Delicate Work
Quest.Description: Get a silk thread.

Quest.Title: Food for Swampman
Quest.Description: One local guy named Swampman will share his philosophical ideas with you for two cans of stewed meat and one flask of spirit. You can find some spirit if square П8.

Quest.Title: Food for the Swampman
Quest.Description: Bring a canteen of spirit to the Swampman.

Quest.Title: Food for the Swampman.
Quest.Description: Bring two cans of a fresh stewed meat to Swampman.

Quest.Title: Swampman's stash
Quest.Description: Find the Swampman's stash in square О12, under the lop-sided tree.

Quest.Title: Bear claws for Butch
Quest.Description: Butch were injured from bear's paws and now is looking for its claws. Butch hands over these claws to a local scientist in hope that this scientist will help to heal his illness. Butch pays well for the claws, though doesn't understand that the scientist isn't engaged in treatment of contused.

Quest.Title: Bear Claws for Butch
Quest.Description: Find and kill a mutant bear.

Quest.Title: Bear Claws for Butch
Quest.Description: Give the claws to Butch.

Quest.Title: Buying Your Freedom
Quest.Description: Bugor will help you break out for 5000000 rubles.

Quest.Title: Blade Runner
Quest.Description: Scientists discovered an unusual anomaly which clones anyone who ever passes by. Professor Chereshnikov fears consequences may be catastrophic. Meanwhile scientists are trying to figure out how to destroy the anomaly, Chereshnikov wants each clone killed. Every day the anomaly makes a new clone, that must be eliminated immediately. The clone of %NPC0% is moving to the north from square К8.
Quest.onFailed: You haven't killed the clone made by the anomaly.

Quest.Title: Blade runner
Quest.Description: Scientists discovered an unusual anomaly which clones anyone who ever passes by. Professor Chereshnikov fears consequences may be catastrophic. Meanwhile scientists are trying to figure out how to destroy the anomaly, Chereshnikov wants each clone killed. Every day the anomaly makes a new clone, that must be eliminated immediately. The clone of %NPC0% is moving to the north from square К8.
Quest.onFailed: You haven't killed the clone made by the anomaly.

Quest.Title: Registering a clan
Quest.Description: Clan manager registeres new clans in the former Militia station.Tthe initial contribution is 2 TASH armor vests and 2 FN-FAL machine guns (no cammo).

Quest.Title: Register the clan
Quest.Description: Get two AS-VAL (without camo) to the registrar.

Quest.Title: Register a Clan
Quest.Description: Bring twoTASH bullet-proof vests to the registrar.

Quest.Title: Cheap tails
Quest.Description: Dima, who stays near the kindergarten, buys 10 tails of mutant rats by a disgraceful cost.

Quest.Title: Cheap heads
Quest.Description: Dima, who stays near the kindergarten, buys 10 heads of mutant puppies by a disgraceful cost.

Quest.Title: Back Home
Quest.Description: Send a guy named Hare home. He's seeing Bald not far from the chemical waste disposal, in square Н14.
Hare and Bald won't be talking for more than 15 minutes.

Quest.onFailed: The conversation between Hare and Bald is over.

Quest.Title: Madhouse
Quest.Description: Tell Dr. Whatman what Dr. House said. You'll find him in an abandoned village, (square И10).

Quest.Title: New Equipment
Quest.Description: Dr. House claimed that Dr. Whatman had destroyed the equipment they needed. Now Dr. House needs 300 000 rubles to buy and deliver new equipment to the Zone.

Quest.Title: Ammunition
Quest.Description: There are lots of ammunition left by the military inside the warehouse Blacksmith sent you to.

Quest.Title: Shooting Mutated Dogs
Quest.Description: There must be a hole somwhere in the wall behind the militia station as mutants keep slipping into the area occupied by the military. Kill as many dogs as you can so that it would be easier for the military to hold their positions.

Quest.Title: Dog Ears
Quest.Description: Kapustin told you that Doc Zinoviev needs more dog ears. He's looking for some special mutants that you can find by a military supply depot. Doc Zinoviev will be waiting for the samples inside the militia station. Kapustin wants those ears himself and wants you to give them to him.

Quest.Title: Dog ears
Quest.Description: Collect mutant dog ears.

Quest.Title: Collect the samples
Quest.Description: Corporal Kapustin asked to collect samples of the mutant dogs body parts for doctor Zinoviev. The doctor needs body parts of big male dogs only from the specific region. Zinoviev waits the samples in the former Police Department.

Quest.Title: Collect Samples
Quest.Description: Collect samples of big mutant dogs.

Quest.Title: Collect Samples
Quest.Description: Hand the samples to doctor Zinoviev to the militia station.

Quest.Title: "Pirate" Gun
Quest.Description: Kolya Acid gave you a gun with a damaged sight. You must shoot some mutated rats to target the gun. Get back to Kolya when you're done.

Quest.Title: The Toys
Quest.Description: Pechkin asked you to search for the toys in the houses near the post.

Quest.Title: The Toys
Quest.Description: Inspect the houses near the post and get Pechkin the following toys: a ball, a tedy bear, a roly-poly and a Rubik's cube.

Quest.Title: The Toys
Quest.Description: Hand the toys to Pechkin.

Quest.Title: What Do Bogies Eat?
Quest.Description: The local from the station is worried that bogies may break into houses, and eat all the food kept inside. The more bogies are dead, the happier he'll be. Also, he'd like to make sure what exactly those creatures eat.

Quest.Title: What Do Bogies Eat?
Quest.Description: Kill at least ten bogies in the village near the station.

Quest.Title: What Do Bogies Eat?
Quest.Description: Bogies seem to like eating mutant rats. Tell the local about that and don't forget to bring him couple of mutant rat tails.

Quest.Title: Bogie Creatures
Quest.Description: A local, the one from the station, is worried that bogies, which eat mutant rats, can carry diseases. It is probably just his paranoia, but he wants you to kill at least 30 bogies near the station.

Quest.Title: Dumpsters
Quest.Description: There're dumpsters not far from the station, that are worth being inspected.
You must find something useful in one of those dumpsters.
Quest.onWin: The local man would like to know what you've found while hunting for "treasures".

Quest.Description: Tell the local what you found while hunting for "treasures".

Quest.Title: Puppy Heads
Quest.Description: Local guys in Liubech use mutant puppy heads to make souvenirs. They accept at least 10 heads at a time.

Quest.Title: Mutant rat tails
Quest.Description: The local in Liubech buy up mutant rat tails.

Quest.Title: Gold under your feet
Quest.Description: A local man, that lives at the station, asked you to get him radio parts of three TV sets, which you could find in the houses nearby.

Quest.Title: Gold under your feet
Quest.Description: Inspect houses in a village near the station. Collect parts from the three broken TV sets.

Quest.Title: Gold under your feet
Quest.Description: Bring the radio parts to the local man at the station.

Quest.Title: The Local Man, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe.
Quest.Description: One local man once put his quilted jacket in a wardrobe. After that just the same jacket started to appear in that wardrobe every day. The local was up to trap and had an idea to sell quilted jackets, but he needed a deliverer. If you get him a jacket, he'll share the proceeds. The wardrobe is in one of the abandoned houses near the station.

Quest.Title: The Local Man, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe.
Quest.Description: Find the quilted jacket.

Quest.Title: The Local Man, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe.
Quest.Description: Give the quilted jacket to the local man.

Quest.Title: The Message
Quest.Description: Powell, who is hanging around the station, asked give Tyomich 15 rubles.

Quest.Title: Extortion
Quest.Description: Powell need to bring Tyomich's debt or Owl will squeeze out Powell. Ask Tyomich what he think about it.

Quest.Title: Impudent extortion
Quest.Description: Powell said that Tyomich have a lot of money from artefacts sale. It's time to take this money from Tyomich.

Quest.Title: Pay the debt
Quest.Description: Tyomich ran into debt to "Owl" and asks to give to the intermediary Powell 50 rubles on account of a duty.

Quest.Title: Extortion: Tyomich's answer
Quest.Description: Tyomich paid a little more money. Return to Powell and report the results.

Quest.Title: Impudent extortion: Tyomich's answer
Quest.Description: Tyomich paid his last money. Report to Powell.

Quest.Title: Liubech
Quest.Description: Newcomers arrive at Liubech station. Stalkers named Kolya Acid and Blacksmith help them to adapt. Talk to both of them.
Station watchman recommended that you speak to Blacksmith first. He can be found at the station where he usually welcomes newcomers.
Blacksmith said Kolya Acid could help you to get a gun.

Quest.Title: Angry Prokhor
Quest.Description: Find out why Prokhor is always in a bad mood.

Quest.Title: Angry Prokhor
Quest.Description: Ivy said that Prokhor would be a nicer person to talk to if someone gave him cigarettes with Ivy's special ingredient.

Quest.Title: Task from Blacksmith
Quest.Description: Blacksmith promised to give you a pack of rounds if you killed the dogs inside an abandoned military warehouse. When you complete the task, get him couple of dog heads as proof.

Quest.Title: Task from blacksmith
Quest.Description: Kill couple of mutant puppies inside the warehouse.

Quest.Title: Task from Blacksmith
Quest.Description: Collect mutant puppy heads and bring them to Blacksmith.

Quest.Title: The Message for Shtaket
Quest.Description: Find Shtaket and tell him the cargo will arrive tonight. Shtaket will be waiting for you on the first floor of the Militia Station, in square 313.

Quest.Title: Find the local technician.
Quest.Description: Blacksmith said he has a local techniques, who can help me to find the MGD. I need to find him. According to Blacksmith, he locates in "one of the five-story building that are at the angle to the road" ...

Quest.Title: Get rounds
Quest.Description: Corporal Kapustin will give you rounds to complete the task from Blacksmith. His post is in square 313.

Quest.Title: Unclear Mission
Quest.Description: Talk to Blacksmith. He can be found at the Liubech station. He usually welcomes newcomers on the platform.

Quest.Title: Working for Kolya Acid
Quest.Description: Acid asked you to kill some mutant dogs outside the village and get him their heards as a trophy.

Quest.Title: Working for Kolya Acid
Quest.Description: Kill a couple of mutant pups in the village.

Quest.Title: Working for Kolya Acid
Quest.Description: Get Acid two mutant pup heads.

Quest.Title: Helping Acid
Quest.Description: Bring the artifacts to Shtaket to pay Acid's debt.

item.title: Артефакты
item.description: В дипломате двойное дно, в котором спрятаны артефакты. Кислый просил передать этот "товар" Штакету -- местному "авторитету", которого можно найти в бывшем здании милиции Любеча.

Quest.Title: Get Rounds
Quest.Description: Pechkin will give a pack of rounds to someone who'll clear the neighbourhood off mutant dogs.

Quest.Title: Acid's Friends
Quest.Description: Kolya Acid asked you to find his friends, Mitya and Spit, who he hasn't heard of for a while. They might be on New Land or inTunguska.

Quest.Title: Acid's Friends
Quest.Description: Find Mitya. Find out if he's doing well.

Quest.Title: Acid's Friends
Quest.Description: Find the Spit. Find out if he's doing well.

item.title: Особые инструменты
item.description: Набор специальных инструментов, предназначенных для настоящего мастера.

item.title: Собачье ухо
item.description: Ухо собаки. Представляет некоторую ценность для ученых.

item.title: Собачье ухо
item.description: Ухо собаки. Представляет некоторую ценность для ученых.

Quest.Title: Blackmail: not working
Quest.Description: Go back to Pavel, tell him what Tyomich said.
Take 15 r.
Powell need more money.

Quest.Title: Blackmail: not working
Quest.Description: Tell Pavel about the results.

Quest.Title: Blackmail: not working
Quest.Description: Pavel says Tyomich earned money after selling artifacts.

Quest.Title: Blackmail: not working
Quest.Description: Pavel asked you to take Tyomich debt for the Owl.

Quest.Title: First steps: Blacksmith
Quest.Description: Prokhor told you to talk to Blacksmith that would be waiting at the entry of the station.

Quest.Title: Vitamins
Quest.Description: The local man saw how the copter crashed, however he is not to talk about that until he gets the vitamins. You can find the vitamins in the abandoned supermarket (square Ж11).
Give that poor guy some cash.
Get 50 rubles from Tyomich.

Quest.Title: Cooking
Quest.Description: One of the locals named Chestnut wants to spit-roast some meat. He needs 10 mutant puppy's heads. You'll find the man not far from the kindergarten.

Quest.Title: Courier -- "Trial"
Quest.Description: Deliver the documents to the post 2. Hand them to corporal Druz.

Quest.Title: Courier - "The Trial"
Quest.Description: Go back to Courier.

Quest.Title: Chatterbox
Quest.Description: Find Valera and make him shut his mouth.

Quest.Title: Chatterbox
Quest.Description: Find Valera and talk to him.

Quest.Title: Chatterbox
Quest.Description: Go back to Rashid.

Quest.Title: Info collector
Quest.Description: Alex wants to know about plans of new habitants of the former police department building. He's willing to pay some cash for right info.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Radio Tubes"
Quest.Description: You've got to inspect posts 1, 2 and 3. Find a broken vacuum tube in each and take them away.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Vacuum Tubes"
Quest.Description: Go to the Corporal Druz's post, find a damaged vacuum tube, take it away. You'll find his post in the northeast corner of square 312.

item.title: Радиолампа
item.description: Битая лампа из сломанной рации.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Vacuum Tubes"
Quest.Description: Go to the Kazakov's post and take the vaccum tube. His post is to the southwest from the Druz's post, in square 312.

item.title: Радиолампа
item.description: Битая лампа из сломанной рации.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Vacuum Tubes"
Quest.Description: Go to the Corporal Kvashin's post, find a broken vacuum tube, take it away. You'll find his post on the border between the squares 312 and 313, not far from the Militia Station.

item.title: Радиолампа
item.description: Битая лампа из сломанной рации.

Quest.Title: Courier -- "Spider Legs"
Quest.Description:
Collect 15 small spider legs and bring them to doc. Eizenstein. You'll find him near the lab in the north corner of square М12.
Bring 15 spider paws to Eizenstein. He is located near the underground lab in the north of M12 area.

Quest.Title: Courier -- "Package for Imarek"
Quest.Description: Courier asked you to deliver the package for a man, named Imarek. He doesn't know where the guy might be so you've got to find him by yourself.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Package for Imarek"
Quest.Description: Find Imarek and hand him the package.

Quest.Title: Courier -"Package for Imarek"
Quest.Description: Go back to Courier.
Give Courier some rounds in exhange for reputation points.

Quest.Title: Courier - "Radio Tubes"
Quest.Description: Find Basmach and make him give you new tubes. He'll be found in square И12, to the left from a biulding with a hammer and sickle on.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Reports
Quest.Description: Take reports from all the posts and bring them to Dibenko.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Reports
Quest.Description: Get Kazakov's report. You'll find his post to the left of the Lenin Statue, in square 312.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Reports
Quest.Description: Get Druz's report. You'll find his post in square 312. Past the Lenin Statue.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Reports
Quest.Description: Get Kvashin's report. You'' find his post right behind the former militia station, in square 313.

Quest.Title: The Scout:Artifact
Quest.Description: Find the "Screen α" artifact and bring it to Dibenko.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Chemical Waste Disposal
Quest.Description: Explore the area near the chemical waste disposal, check if there're any miurants.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Chemical Waste Disposal
Quest.Description: Find and explore the chemical waste disposal in square Н14.
Quest.onWin: Having explored the area, go back to Dibenko.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Chemical Waste Disposal
Quest.Description: Go back to the former militia station in square И13 and tell Dibenko what you saw.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Verliocks
Quest.Description: Find and kill 20 verliocks.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Imarek
Quest.Description: Find Imarek, fix him up if he needs help and take him back to Dibenko.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Imarek
Quest.Description: Find out what happened to Imarek and where he is now. Dibenko sent him to square Л10 so he might be still there.

Quest.Title: The Scout: Imarek
Quest.Description: Help Imarek and tell Dibenko what's happened.

Quest.Title: Reports
Quest.Description: Collect all the reports and bring them to Dibenko.

Quest.Title: Reports
Quest.Description: Find Kazakov's post and get his report.

Quest.Title: Reports
Quest.Description: Find Druz's post and get his report.

Quest.Title: Reports
Quest.Description: Find Kvashin's post and get his report.

Quest.Title: Black Hawk Down
Quest.Description: Sergeant Dibenko lost 3 helicopters in the Zone.
Find the first copter and its pilot.
Find the village of the White. Learn what they did to the pilot.
Trace the group of bandits right to Vesuvius and find out what happened to the pilot.

Quest.Title: First steps: Kolya Acid
Quest.Description: Kolya Acid will help you get a gun. He's waiting for you inside the station.
Inform Palka about new deal place.
Give Stick the fake package.

Quest.Title: Three Bears
Quest.Description: Shtaket wants you to get him bear heads. Find a mutant bear. kill it and take its head along.

Quest.Title: Bear Head
Quest.Description: Get brown bear head. Don't expect it to be very expensive.

Quest.Title: Bear Head
Quest.Description: Get one red bear head.

Quest.Title: Bear Head
Quest.Description: Get one polar bear head. It's very valuable and expensive.

Quest.Title: Four Arts
Quest.Description: Talk to Shtaket about artifacts. Get him four arts of different types.

Quest.Title: Four Arts
Quest.Description: Find "Screen α" artifact.

Quest.Title: Four Arts
Quest.Description: Find "Pillow α" artifact.

Quest.Title: Four Arts
Quest.Description: Find "Stabilizer α" artifact.

Quest.Title: Four Arts
Quest.Description: Find "Shield α" artifact.

Quest.Title: Cleaning the Neighbourhood
Quest.Description: There's a pack of mutant dogs not far from the former Militia Station. Kill at least couple of dogs for Shtaket.

Quest.Title: Misunderstanding
Quest.Description: Shtaket didn't pay you for the job you've done. Go back to Blacksmith and sort it out.

Quest.Title: Reward for the Arts
Quest.Description: Go to the Palace of Culture and take your money from Metrofan.

Quest.Title: Save Acid
Quest.Description: Kolya Acid is wanted. Price was set on his head. %NPC0% intends to get the price and kill him. Now the killer is moving towards the station. Stop him until he finds Kolya.
Quest.onWin: You saved Acid.
Quest.onFailed: Someone else saved Kolya Acid. Sorry it wasn't you.

Quest.Title: Help Sanya the Old Coon
Quest.Description: Sanya usually hangs out near the north tower at the House Of Culture square.

Quest.Title: Rashid's info
Quest.Description: Rashid does some business with the Ravenwood. And have stolen some arts from them. You can blackmail him with this info.

Quest.Title: Verliock Paws
Quest.Description: Swamp trader can buy some verliock paws.
Buy a drink for Old Stalker.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: Go check the new buildings. Area E12. North-east.
Quest.onWin: The new district teemed with mutants, but something killed them all. The dead mutants are placed unusually, as though is intended. The Palace of Culture is nearby, in the Lubech city. Someone may know or heard something about it.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back.
Quest.Description: Something had killed the mutants in the new buildings area. Go ask people fro the culture house about it.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: Scientists could know something about the experiments.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: The "Black Meta"'s gates are sealed. Some military officers could help you with that.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: Find Zhora the Crucian at the second floor of the Palace of Culture and make him give you the bear head for Nicheporenko.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: Give the bear head to Nicheporenko.

Quest.Title: To the hell and back
Quest.Description: Find the secret bunker in the square Г2 near Vesuvius and kill the mutant.

Quest.Title: To the Hell and Back
Quest.Description: Either scientists or local fanatics may be interested in having some of fiend body parts.

Quest.Title: Cigarettes for Mikulo
Quest.Description: Mikulo wants a box of Ivy's cigarettes.

Quest.Title: Get a Package
Quest.Description: Stick is waiting for a package from his "personal" supplier. The package was left in behind one of the benches in the park.

Quest.Title: Talk to Greek
Quest.Description: All stalkers check in at Greek's. He is on the upper floor of the militia station.

Quest.Title: Strange Noise
Quest.Description: Stick is disturbed by strange noise coming from the west checkpoint. He's sure they're not dogs that make the noise.
Check the bushes near the militia station.
Quest.onWin: Anomalies...and traces of boars. Tell Stick all you saw,

Quest.Description: Talk with Stick about the hogs.

Quest.Title: Two "Broken Screens" for Sisyphus
Quest.Description: Sisyphus buys Broken Screens, two at a time. If you follow the railroad from the station, you'll get to him.

Quest.Title: Messenger
Quest.Description: Stick wants to rebuild communication which broke when the military came. He's looking for a man who can leave the militia station without arousing suspicion and then contact the messenger.

Quest.Title: News about the Spit
Quest.Description: Spit is a dealer now. He exchanges ammo for arts. He wants to save some cash and get away from the Zone. Kolya Acid would be happy to hear some news about his old friend.

Quest.Title: "Vintorez"
Quest.Description: The Collector who lives in a camp near Vesuvius, in square И3, knows how to craft VSS "Vintorez". He'll tell his secret only to another collector.
The Collector wants to know that his successor is capable to find whole parts of the weapon suitable for further craft.
Find 35 "Vintorez's" silencers and bring them to Collector.
Find 35 parts of the "Vintorez's" bodies and bring them to Collector.
Find 35 "Vintorez's" buttstocks and bring them to Collector.
Find 35 "Vintorez's" magazines and bring them to Collector.
Find Dumpster and convince him to give you recommendation.
Bring Dumpster's recommendation to Collector.
Bring the ticket to Tunguska.

Quest.Title: Dog Heads for Sanek the Old Coon
Quest.Description: Kill 10 dogs, collect their heads and give them to Sanek the Old Coon.

Quest.Title: Dog Heads for Sanek The Old Coon
Dog Heads for Sanek The Old Coon
Equipment for Sanek thу Old Coon.
Quest.Description: Collect all the equipment Sanek the Old Coon needs.

Quest.Title: Equipment for Sanek thу Old Coon.
Quest.Description: Find 5 small med kits and get them to Sanek the Old Coon.

Quest.Title: Equipment for Sanek the Old Coon.
Quest.Description: Get 6 packs of 12/70 rounds (162 bullets).

Quest.Title: Equipment for Sanek thу Old Coon.
Quest.Description: Get one"Kolobock" backpack and give it to Sanek the Old Coon.

Quest.Title: Kill Boar
Quest.Description: Test your abilities and skills by killing a mutant boar.

Quest.Title: The Stadium
Quest.Description: Sound out the situation around the stadium. Go back to Sanek the Old Coon when you're done.

Quest.Title: The Stadium
Quest.Description: Sound out the situation around the stadium is square Ж12.
Quest.onWin: The stadium is absolutely empty, only mutant dog's yawl is breaking the silence...

Quest.Title: The Stadium
Quest.Description: Go back to Sanek the Old Coon and tell what you've seen.

Quest.Title: Swamp House
Quest.Description: Find the swamp house and check if there're lots of anomalies and artifacts about.

Quest.Title: Helping Acid
Quest.Description: This quset is offered to a player to check his readiness to fix the issue he's to blame for.

Quest.Title: Looking for the Artifacts
Quest.Description: Find and collect 3 "Screen α" artifacts. Let Sanek the Old Coon have them so he could help Acid out.

Quest.Title: Quarrel with saken the Old Coon
Quest.Description: Remember, stalkers are not likely to be willing to help you if you treat them badly.

Quest.Title: Find the Murderer
Quest.Description: Sanek the Old Coon asked you to find who'd killed his friend.
Temon arrived to the Lubech's railway station.
A guy at Ive's bar is sure Temon was killed by so-called Dark Stalker.
Temon was seen several hours before he was killed. He was going in the direction of the militia station.
"Temon" put a sign into Greek's journal. Probably, that wat the murderer, so-called Dark Stalker, who named himself after his victim.
The murderer got a gob from Courier and left Luibech through Kazakov's gate. Talk to Kazakov.
The murderer left Luibech, passing through Kazakov's gate. He went in the direction of the village called Gourmet.
The murderer was seen in the village called Gourmet. He left it and went to the northeast.
The murderer has joined the White Brotherhood.
The murderer was excluded from the White Brotherhood. He could have run away to the swamps.
The murderer has gone to find Warrant Officer Nechiporenko, who helps those who offended against the law. Nechiporenko can be found in Tunguska, his post is in the village called Gourmet.
The colonel amnestied Dark Stalker. He said the murderer had flown to New Land.

item.title: КПК Темного Сталкера
item.description: В КПК фотографии, на которых запечатлены убийца Темона и Санек Бывалый.

Quest.Description: Dark Stalker went absolutely nuts. He's hiding in a cave on New Land. You found some photos with Temon's killer and Sanek the Old Coon right next to him. Sanek might help you clear things up.

Quest.Title: Tastes like Chicken
Quest.Description: Gourmet asled you to get him eight dead rats.

Quest.Title: Tastes like Chicken
Quest.Description: Collect dead rats.

Quest.Title: Give money to Sanek the Old Coon
Looking for Stepan's friend
Quest.Description: Explore the village (square 311-2) and find Stepan's friend.

Quest.Title: Looking for Stepan's Friend
Quest.Description: Vitya was killed in battle. You found a PDA on his body. Tell Stepan what happened to his friend and give him Vitya's PDA.

Quest.Title: Korean Cuisine
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet as many dog heads as he needs.

Quest.Title: Boar Legs
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet three boar legs.

Quest.Title: Boar Legs
Quest.Description: Gourmet's waiting for three portions of boar fillet. Get him three boar legs.

Quest.Title: Extreme Cookery
Quest.Description: Kill as many verliocks as it'll take to get an undamaged wing. Get the wing to Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Culinary Art
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet one (brown) bear head.

Quest.Title: Stewed Boar Ear
Quest.Description: Gourmet wants to cook something really special. He needs spider legs and one boar ear for his experiments.

Quest.Title: Stewed Boar Ear
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet spider legs. Six will be enough.

Quest.Title: Stewed Boar Ear
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet one boar ear.

Quest.Title: Fried Jelly brains
Quest.Description: Gourmet wants to fry jelly brains with blyack fat. Yummy!

Quest.Title: Fried Jelly brains
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet jelly brains.

Quest.Title: Fried Jelly brains
Quest.Description: Collect blyak fat for Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Fried Jelly brains
Quest.Description: Gourmet asked you to get him spicies.

Quest.Title: Fried Jelly brains
Quest.Description: Gourmet asked you to get him some solt.

Quest.Title: Culinary Fiasco
Quest.Description: The Gourmet asked you to get him five rolls of toilet paper for his friends and clients (former clients from now on).

Quest.Title: Soup
Quest.Description: Gourmet wants to use brutor bones as the main ingredients for his soup. Ten bones will be enough.

Quest.Title: Brutor bone soup
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet brutor bones. Impaired brutor bones won't do.

Quest.Title: Verliock Eye for Dessert
Quest.Description: Gourmet is ready to serve verliock eye for dessert. He'll need tea, glassholders and silvan hair to spread the tea.

Quest.Title: Verliock Eye for Dessert
Quest.Description: Gourmet asked you to get him pone undamaged verliock eye.

Quest.Title: Verliock Eye for Dessert
Quest.Description: Gourmet needs tea.

Quest.Title: Verliock Eye for Dessert
Quest.Description: Gourmet needs at least three glassholders.

Quest.Title: Verliock Eye for Dessert
Quest.Description: Gourmet needs silvan hairs. But only of those that live in squares К5 and Л5. Get him at least three pieces.

Quest.Title: Bottles for the Hermit
Quest.Description: Bring Dumpster's bottles toTimoha. The Hermit lives in the swamps of Vesuvius, in the square Б2.

item.title: Бутылки Мусорщика
item.description: Пустые бутылки, которые Мусорщик собрал на помойке за магазином Фина. Отшельник Тимоха использует их под свои микстуры. Тимоха утверждает, что предварительно моет каждую бутылку с особой тщательностью, как внутри, так и снаружи...

Quest.Title: Unique analyzer
Quest.Description: Dumpster asked to bring him Aybolit's analyzer.
Get the quest from Aybolit, but give the analyzer to Dumpster.

Quest.Title: The new batch of bottles
Quest.Description: Dumpster collected another batch of bottles for the Hermit.

item.title: Бутылки Мусорщика
item.description: Пустые бутылки, которые Мусорщик собрал на помойке за магазином Фина. Отшельник Тимоха использует их под свои микстуры. Тимоха утверждает, что предварительно моет каждую бутылку с особой тщательностью, как внутри, так и снаружи...

Quest.Description: Carry Dumpster's bottles to Timoha the Hermit who lives in a swamp, in square Б2.

Quest.Title: Return the analyzer
Quest.Description: Dumpster was not up to the task.
Dumpster dropped the analyzer in the fold of rats in the abandoned base, square A6.

item.title: Разбитый анализатор
item.description: Анализатор Айболита, предназначенный для сбора информации о живых мутантах. Отслеживает движения. Улавливает сердцебиение на ближних дистанциях. Способен распознавать звуки и запахи. Собранные данные хранит на встроенной флеш-памяти... Прибор сломался из-за неосторожного обращения и падения на землю. На левой стороне остались следы зубов крысы-мутанта.

Quest.Description: Bring the broken analyzer to Aybolit and explain the situation.

Quest.Title: Artefact for Dumpster
Quest.Description: Dumpster wants to sell "Vesuvius" and is willing to share profit, but he never saw the artefact and have no idea where to find it. Dumpster lives near Fin's shop, in square A5 of the Vesuvius territory.
Find "Vesuvius" for Dumpster.
Someone confused Dumpster by telling about the "Screen α" artefact. If you bring a Screen, you can easily convince the homeless that it is "Vesuvius".
Bring the "Broken Screen". Hardly Dumpster believe that this is an expensive rare artefact, but nothing venture nothing have...

Quest.Title: Artefact was stolen!
Quest.Description: Dumpster did not have time to sell the artefact, because it was stolen.
The thief named %NPC0% moving towards the alcoholic beverage plant. Someone need to catch up with him and return the stolen artefact.
Quest.onWin: Dumpster will be glad to know that it is all over with the thief.
Quest.onFailed: The thief fled or died. Now the artefact is out of reach.

item.title: Дипломат с артефактом
item.description: В этом дипломате с двойным дном спрятан артефакт, который был украден у Мусорщика.

Quest.Description: Dumpster will be glad to know that the thief is dead.

Quest.Title: Easy money
Quest.Description: Dumpster gave another batch of bottles for Hermit and he told that you can keep all the money. The Hermit lives in the marshes, in square Б2.

item.title: Бутылки Мусорщика
item.description: Пустые бутылки, которые Мусорщик собрал на помойке за магазином Фина. Отшельник Тимоха использует их под свои микстуры. Тимоха утверждает, что предварительно моет каждую бутылку с особой тщательностью, как внутри, так и снаружи...

Quest.Title: Artefact was stolen... again!
Quest.Description: Dumpster was robbed again.
The thief %NPC0% is moving towards the alcoholic beverage plant. Someone need to catch up with him and return the stolen artefact.
Quest.onWin: Dumpster will be glad to know that it is all over with the thief.
Quest.onFailed: The thief fled or died. Now the artefact is out of reach.

Quest.Description: There are no traces of the artefact, but Dumpster will be glad to know that the thief is dead.

Quest.Title: More bottles
Quest.Description: Bring Dumpster's bottles toTimoha. The Hermit lives in the swamps of Vesuvius, in the square Б2.

item.title: Бутылки Мусорщика
item.description: Пустые бутылки, которые Мусорщик собрал на помойке за магазином Фина. Отшельник Тимоха использует их под свои микстуры. Тимоха утверждает, что предварительно моет каждую бутылку с особой тщательностью, как внутри, так и снаружи...

Quest.Title: "Vesuvius" for Dumpster
Quest.Description: Find "Vesuvius" for Dumpster. You can't cheat him again.

Quest.Title: Even more bottles
Quest.Description: Bring Dumpster's bottles toTimoha. The Hermit lives in the swamps of Vesuvius, in the square Б2.

item.title: Бутылки Мусорщика
item.description: Пустые бутылки, которые Мусорщик собрал на помойке за магазином Фина. Отшельник Тимоха использует их под свои микстуры. Тимоха утверждает, что предварительно моет каждую бутылку с особой тщательностью, как внутри, так и снаружи...

Quest.Title: Take back "Vesuvius"
Quest.Description: Try to take back the "Vesuvius".
The huckster %NPC0% got"Vesuvius" for next to nothing and now is moving toward the Distelled Spirits Plant.
Quest.onWin: The artifact not found. Tell Dumpster about that.
Quest.onFailed: The huckster either fled or died. Now the artifact is out of reach.

Quest.Description: No traces of the artefact. You should tell Dumpster.
The only place the huckster dropped by is Fin's shop. However, he could have hidden the art somewhere on his way or sold it to anyone.
Dumpster lied all the time. It's time to talk to him.

Quest.Title: Murder for Dumpster
Quest.Description: Dumpster is willing to pay for the murder of unwanted stalkers who are trading with Fiin.
%NPC0% moving towards the alcoholic beverage plant. Dumpster will pay for his murder.
Quest.onFailed: Stalker disappeared or died not from your hand. Dumpster will not pay for such work.

Quest.Description: Return to Dumpster to recieve the reward.

Quest.Title: Money from Dumpster
Quest.Description: You can get some money from Dumpster every day.

Quest.Title: The Hermit's debt
Quest.Description: Timoha owed ​​money for the last batch of bottles. It's time to see him.

Quest.Title: Abnormal padded jacket
Quest.Description: Somehow Dumpster found out about the "anomaly wardrobe" in Lubech. Now he knows that it producing jackets. He wants to "plant" a jacket in similar building near Vesuvius, to get a permanent source of an income.

Quest.Title: The Local, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe
Quest.Description: The wardrobe you're looking for is inside one of the abandoned houses in front of the Liubech station.

Quest.Title: The Local, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe
Quest.Description: Bring the jacket to Dumpster. You'll find him not far from Fin's store (square A5).

Quest.Title: Wait until the padded jacket sprout
Quest.onWin: Padded jacket must be germinated already. It's time to visit Dumpster.

Quest.Title: Wait for a second jacket
Quest.onWin: Padded jacket must be germinated already. It's time to visit Dumpster.

Quest.Title: Abnormal padded jacket, part 2
Quest.Description: Dumpster put the jacket to the wardrobe in the nearby village, in square A5. The padded jacket has had to "grow", it is time to harvest it.

Quest.Title: The Local, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe
Quest.Description: Dumpster has forgotten which wardrobe he put the jacket in. Now you've got to check every wardrobe in the village.

Quest.Title: The Local, the Quilted Jacket and the Wardrobe
Quest.Description: Bring the jacket to Dumpster.

Quest.Title: Harvesting
Quest.Description: Dumpster sold the first jacket. It's time to get the second one.
The padded jacket should be in one of the wardrobes in the nearby houses. Have to search all wardrobes.
Quest.onWin: The jacket can't be found. Need to talk with Dumpster about it.

Quest.Description: The jacket can't be found. Need to talk with Dumpster about it.

Quest.Title: Abnormal padded jacket, part 3
Quest.Description: Dumpster tried to plant the jacket in houses near Vesuvius, but it did not work. He asked to bring him one more.
The wardrobe, in which jackets are grown, located in one of the abandoned houses, near the Lubech station.
Quest.onWin: No traces of the jacket. It's time to talk with its owner.

Quest.Description: No traces of the jacket. It's time to talk with its owner. This homeless can be found near the Lubech station.

Quest.Title: Hogs for Zhivoderov
Quest.Description: Dr. Zhivoderov can't handle hogs, but he needs to research their legs and tusks.

Quest.Title: Hogs for Doc Flayer
Quest.Description: Bring 5 hoglegs to Doc Flayer

Quest.Title: Hogs for Doc Flayer
Quest.Description: Bring 5 hog tusks to Doc Flayer.

Quest.Title: Tongues ​​and claws
Quest.Description: Dr. Zhivoderov can't handle blyaks, but he needs to research their claws and tongues. And he have not interest in stupid blyaks.

Quest.Title: Tongues and Claws
Quest.Description: Bring blyak claw to Doc Flayer.

Quest.Title: Tongues and Claws
Quest.Description: Bring the blyak tongue to Doc Flayer

Quest.Title: Extra pair of hands
Quest.Description: Dr. Zhivoderov can't handle quick fiends, but he needs to research their hands. One pair at least.

Quest.Title: The Cage, the Scientist and the Mutants
Quest.Description: Patisson, the scientist in the cage, is very sensitive to killing mutants nearby.
Zhivoderov, one of the scientists at the camp, suggested to kill the mutants, until Patisson will not hand over his nerves.
If you regularly kill mutants near Patisson, he will realize the futility of his work. Then the scientist should leave the cage and return to the camp.
The number of dead rats in the area is unlikely to leave Patisson indifferent. It's time to check his reaction.
Mutants return to this area regularly and Patisson is in no hurry to leave his cage. Should talk with Zhivoderov about this failure.
Perhaps, if you don't kill mutants and help Patisson with his studies, he'll agree to cooperate.
Find a scientist who is sympathetic to mutants.
Carry out the experiment of Dr. Aybolit. After the transfer of all necessary data to Aybolit, tell Patisson the results of the experiment.

Quest.Title: The Cage, the Scientist and Starvation
Quest.Description: Zhivoderov convinced other scientists to stop victual Patisson.
Ask Patisson how he is holding up...
Support Zhivoderov and leave Patisson without food. It's unlikely Patisson will hold on more long than pair of days.
Quest.onWin: It's time to check Patisson...

Quest.Description: It's time to check Patisson...
Starvation can't break Patisson. Need to talk with Zhivoderov about it.
Help Patisson hold on by bringing him five cans of stewed meat.

Quest.Title: The Last Drop
Quest.Description: Zhivoderov continues to starve Patisson. He also convinced scientists to stop water supply to the scientist. Patisson is left to the mercy of fate.
Support Zhivoderov by not helping Patisson.
It's hard to believe Patisson will survive more than a couple of days without food and water.
Quest.onWin: It's time to check Patisson...

Quest.Description: It's time to check Patisson...
Patisson is in very bad shape, but he refuse to leave the cage. Time to talk to Zhivoderov.
If provide with stewed meat and water, Patisson can hold on without the support from the camp.
Get Patisson five cans of stewed meat.
Get a canteen of water from Whatman and give it to Patisson. Whatman is exploring an abandoned village in square И10.

Quest.Title: Food and Water for Patisson
Quest.Description: Patisson is dying for something to eat and drink. Doc. Flayer admited he was wrong and asked you to provide Patisson with food and water.
Find and bring Patisson some stewed meat.
Find and bring Patisson a bottle of water.

Quest.Title: Swampman's Debts
Quest.Description: Kich wants you to collect a dept from the Swampman, he owes 30000 to mercenaries and is hiding from them somewhere in the swamps.

Quest.Title: Swampman's Debts
Quest.Description: Find Swampman.

Quest.Title: Swampman's Debts
Quest.Description: Kich wants his three thousands back. Although Kich told you to collect a dept from the Swampman, he actually doesn't care where you'll take money from...

Quest.Title: Priest's Debts
Quest.Description: Kich wants his twelve thousands back. Despite the fact that he said you could take the money from teh Priest, it doesn't really matter where you find it.

Quest.Title: Gourmet's Debts
Quest.Description: Kich wants his fifty thousands back. Despite the fact that he said you could take the money from teh Gourmet, it doesn't really matter where you find it.

Quest.Title: Gourmet's Debts
Quest.Description: Find the Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Priest's Debts
Quest.Description: The Priest is hiding somewhere in a village. Find him and collect the debt.

Quest.Title: Priest's debt
Quest.Description: Kich wants you to collect a debt from the Priest. The Priest owes 50 000 the mercenaries from the Raven Wood clan.

Quest.Title: Gourmet's debt
Quest.Description: Kich wants you to collect a dept from Gourmet. He owes 100 000 to mercenaries and is hiding somewhere on the outskirts of Liubech.

Quest.Title: Energy Boost
Quest.Description: Bring Tesla 25 electrical parts for his invention.

Quest.Title: Waste not, want not
Quest.Description: Boxy asked you to find "Flashlights", they should be nearby. It looks like they located at the "White's" willage.

Quest.Title: Waste not, want not
Quest.Description: Get the "Flashlights" back to Boxy.

Quest.Title: Tongue falters
Quest.Description: Find the captain Feck-o in the Village of the White and hand him the Pretzel's code.

Quest.Title: Bare Headed
Quest.Description: Krol's hat must be somewhere in the village of the White. Check all the houses there and bring the hat back to its owner.

Quest.Title: Good Racket
Quest.Description: Bald promised a decent reward for three "Screen α" artifacts.

Quest.Title: Good Racket
Quest.Description: This time Bald asks for three "Screens α" and two "Pillows α" artifacts.

Quest.Title: Good Racket
Quest.Description: Get three "Screens α" arts for Bald.

Quest.Title: Good Racket
Quest.Description: Get two "Pillows α" arts for Bald.

Quest.Title: Saving from Gastritis
Quest.Description: Bald is tired of having the same stuff for breakfast, luch and dinner. He wants you to get him one young boar leg.

Quest.Title: Fraud
Quest.Description: Bald did take the arts but didn't give you a penny for your job. You've got to find an experienced stalker of a powerful military man, that could make Bald pay you.

Quest.Title: Reward from Bald
Quest.Description: Bald has promised to split the profit from selling the arts with you. Co back to him in 20 minutes.

Quest.Title: Reward from Bald
Quest.Description: Bald asked you to wait till he tied up a deal.
Quest.onWin: Bald must have tied up a deal by now. It's time to take what is yours.

Quest.Title: Reward from Bald
Quest.Description: Bald must have tied up a deal by now. It's time to take what is yours.

Quest.Title: No more Chappi
Quest.Description: Kill 25 dogs near the stadium. The stadium is in the square Ж12.

Quest.Title: Smart thief
Quest.Description: Merchant Maslov was robbed by thief named %NPC0%. If you catch and kill a thief, you can keep his staff. The thief was hiding behind the houses near the dealer and he could not go far.
Quest.onFailed: The thief left or was killed not by you...

Quest.Title: Extremely smart thief
Quest.Description: Merchant Maslov was robbed by thief named %NPC0%. If you catch and kill a thief, you can keep his staff. The thief was hiding behind the houses near the dealer and he could not go far.
Quest.onFailed: The thief left or was killed not by you...

Quest.Title: News from Mitka
Quest.Description: Mitka is tracking down someone in Tunguska. He says he doesn't know "the old firend of his". Tell Acid about that.

Quest.Title: Kill the debtor
Quest.Description: Stalker %NPC0% disrespected the local crime boss. Shoot this lout and debtor as a warning to others. The stalker left the cave through the nearest exit from Mokruch and moved to the field of anomalies, intending to hide among them.
Quest.onFailed: Stalker went away or was killed not by you...

Quest.Title: Test
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane want you to bring him boar's leg.

Quest.Title: Test
Quest.Description: Kill a mutant boar.

Quest.Title: Test
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane is waiting for young boar's leg.

Quest.Title: Mysterious Triangle
Quest.Description: There are three barrows that form a kind of triangle. They all radiate mysterious psi-energy. Go and examine the barrows.

Quest.Title: Tastes like Chicken
Quest.Description: Get the rats bodies to Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Delicacy
Quest.Description: Gourmet wants you to get him six spader legs.

Quest.Title: Delicacy
Quest.Description: Collect 6 spider legs for Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Delicacy
Quest.Description: Get the spider legs to Gourmet.

Quest.Title: Korean Cuisine
Quest.Description: Get Gourmet four dog heads.

Quest.Title: Extreme Cookery
Quest.Description: Gourmet wants you to get him an undamaged verliock wing.

Quest.Title: Food Poisoning
Quest.Description: Gourmet almost killed his two neighbors with his New-year dish. Bring them an antidote, which you'll get from the Veterinarian who lives in the White's village, square П8.

Find the Veterinarian in the White's village.
.
The Veterinarian will make an anditode, he'll need young verliock legs as the main ingredients. Six will be enough for two portions.

item.title: Противоядие
item.description: Это противоядие дал вам Ветеринар.

Quest.Description: Get gourmet the antidote.

item.title: Дед Мороз
item.description: Новогодняя елочная игрушка -- стеклянный Дед Мороз.

Quest.Description: You've collected the last Christmas-tree decoration. Get it to Morozov.

Quest.Title: Get Metrofan 10 spider legs
Quest.Description: Metrofan is waiting for 10 spider legs being delivered.

Quest.Title: Get Metrofan 10 spider legs
Quest.Description: Collect 10 small spider legs and bring them to Metrofan.

Quest.Title: Get Metrofan 30 spider legs
Quest.Description: Collect 30 small spider legs and bring them to Metrofan.

Quest.Title: Journey to Ryabinushka
Quest.Description: Explore the village called Ryabinushka and its neighbourhood. Go back to Metrofan when you're done.

Quest.Title: Journey to Ryabinushka
Quest.Description: Get to Ryabinushka village.
Quest.onWin: Welcome to Ryabinushka! Go back to Metrofan and tell him what you saw.

Quest.Title: Journey to Ryabinushka
Quest.Description: Talk to Metrofan. He's inside the Palace of Culture in Liubech.

Quest.Title: Yura Barabashka
Quest.Description: Find out what has become of Yura Barabashka.

Quest.Title: Yura Barabashka
Quest.Description: Yura was seen near garages to the sounth from a stadium, in square Ж13. Check the red garage.

Quest.Title: Yura Barabashka
Quest.Description: Go back to Metrofan and tell him what happened to Yura.

Quest.Title: Help Sanek the Old Coon
Quest.Description: Sanek can be found near the northern tower right behind the Palace of Culture.

Quest.Title: bonus
Quest.Description: If the player refuses to help Barabashka, Metrofan gives him less cash.

Quest.Title: Go back to Yura
Quest.Description: Go back Yura and help him.

Quest.Title: Go back to Yura
Quest.Description: Tell Metrofan that you did help Yura.

Quest.Title: trigger
Quest.Description: Doesn't want to help Yura.

Quest.Title: Waste not, want not
Quest.Description: Find a flashlight.

Quest.Title: Waste not, want not
Quest.Description: Find another flashligh.

Quest.Title: Bare Headed
Quest.Description: I need to give the hat back to Krol.

Quest.onWin: Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.
Wardrobe is empty.

Quest.Title: Get a Viking helmet
Quest.Description: Get a Viking helmet

Quest.Title: Get Glock-18
Quest.Description: Get Glock-18

Quest.Title: Get the backpack
Quest.Description: Get the backpack

Quest.Title: Medical spirit
Quest.Description: Corkscrew is the ex-colonel's assistant. He offers to pay a good price for every bottle of medical spirit. And he promises to use it only for medical purposes.

Quest.Title: "Mirage" for Corkscrew
Quest.Description: Corkscrew sells "Mirages" to the scientists. Also he uses it as the painkillers and hallucinogenic remedy. For medical purposes, of course.

Quest.Title: Mysterious Triangle
Quest.Description: There is an abandoned house on the boader between squares К11 and К12. Find and expolre it.
Quest.onWin: You can clearly feel psi-energy being radiated here. It's like a mind wind that you can feel but cannot see. It carries you away right toward the swampland.

Quest.Title: Mysterious Triangle
Quest.Description: Find and explore the house in the swamp.
Quest.onWin: You can clearly feel psi-energy being radiated here.

Quest.Title: Mysterious Triangle
Quest.Description: Find and explore chemical waste disposal.
Quest.onWin: Psi-enegry is especially strong here. It seems to be coming from the other two triangles and gathers in masses here.

Quest.Title: Mysterious Triangle
Quest.Description: Let Flybane know what you saw.

Quest.Title: Spider Hunt
Quest.Description: Light Mentor desired to stamp mutant spider out of existence. The White want at least 100 spiders to be killed.
Quest.onWin: Light Mentor is satisfied with results.The White aren't bothered with spiders any longer.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: You're gonna need some samples of venom glands of verliock to make the antidote. Veterinarian, that lives in the village of the White (square П8) will help you make it.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: Collect verliock claws.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: Collect 3 verliock claws. Veterinarian needs them as ingredients to make the antidote.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: It'll take some time for Veterinarian to make the antidote. Come back later.
Quest.onWin: The antidote must be ready. Come back to Veterinarian.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: The antidote must be ready. Return to Veterinarian.

item.title: Противоядие
item.description: Это противоядие дал вам Ветеринар.

Quest.Title: Antidote
Quest.Description: Hand the antidote to Flybane.

Quest.Title: X-Files
Quest.Description: Shaggy, who lives on the swampland, can help you decode the documents. Talk to him.

Quest.Title: X-Files
Quest.Description: Bring the papers to Mikhail the Mentor. He must be in the village of the White (square П8).

Quest.Title: Bloody rivers, bloody banks
Quest.Description: Kill ten verliocks for Tackleberry.

Quest.Title: Magic Swamps
Quest.Description: Vasyatka heard about an unbelievably strong silvan that was said to be wandering in the swamps.

Quest.Title: Magic Swamps
Quest.Description: Explore the swampland, square H8.
Quest.onWin: Silvan's dead body is found in the swamp. It's a regular size silvan. Fear has big eyes, as they say. Tell Vasyatka what you saw.

Quest.Title: Magic Swamps
Quest.Description: Tell Vasyatka what you saw.

Quest.Title: Artefacts for Whatman
Quest.Description: Doctor Whatman wants to gain respect of his colleagues, for that he needs artefacts.

Quest.Title: Arts fow Whatman
Quest.Description: Find four "Screens α" for Whatman.

Quest.Title: arts for Whatman
Quest.Description: Bring six "Pillows α".

Quest.Title: Arts for Whatman
Quest.Description: Bring two "Stabilizers α".

Quest.Title: Collect ingredients for the potion
Quest.Description: Veterinarian, who lives in the village of the White Brotherhood, asked to collect components for the potion.

Quest.Title: Collecting Ingredients for Decoction
Quest.Description: Collect ten legs of small spiders.

Quest.Title: Collecting Ingredients for Decoction
Quest.Description: Find five tusks of a young wild boar.

Quest.Title: Collecting Ingredients for Decoction
Quest.Description: Find two paws of a young verliock.

Quest.Title: Rendezvous
Quest.Description: Yashka's waiting for his friend's message. The note must be inside an old fridge somewhere not far from the stadium.

Quest.Title: Rendezvous
Quest.Description: Check the fridge not far from the stadium.
Quest.onWin: Yaska said his friends had left a message for him. But there's nothing inside the frisge. At least yet.

Quest.Title: Rendezvous
Quest.Description: Go back to Yashka.

Quest.Title: Your tongue will get you anywhere
Quest.Description: Get 10 stupid blyak tongues. Bring them to Zelenkin.

Quest.Title: Spider Legs
Quest.Description: Swamp trader buys up spider legs.

Quest.Title: Spider cocoons
Quest.Description: Find spider cocoons for Imarek. Check the square M8, to the north from the settlement. Collect 10 cocoons and bring them to Imarek.

Quest.Title: Yura's Backpack
Quest.Description: Yura hid his backpack in an old fridge in square Е12. There's a scary mutant boar near the fridge which Yura cannot fight himself as he's ot of rounds. You must find the fridge, take the backpack out and bring it to Yura.

Quest.Title: Yura's Backpack
Quest.Description: Yura put his backpack into an old fridge, which is on a hill in squareЕ12.
Quest.onWin: The fridge with Yura's backpack in must be about somewhere.

Quest.Title: Yura's Backpack
Quest.Description: Take Yura's backpack out of the fridge.

Quest.Title: Yura's Backpack
Quest.Description: Hand the backpack to Yura Barabashka. You'll find him in a garage to the south from the stadium.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Backpack
Quest.Description: Hand the backpack to Yura Barabashka. He's waiting for you in a garage to the south from the stadium.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Backpack
Quest.Description: Take Yura's backpack out of the fridge.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Backpack.
Quest.Description: You can find a copy of Yura's backpack in an old fridge on a hill in square Е12.
Quest.onWin: The fridge with Yura's backpack inside must be about somewhere.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Backpack
Quest.Description: When Yura returned to the fridge, where he had put his backpack, he found another backpack inside, which was the exact same copy of his own with he only difference that it was empty. Yura believes if he keeps taking the copies out of the fridge, he'll eventually find one with his artifacts inside.

Quest.Title: trigger
Quest.Description: It'sa rigger quest, designed to filter dialogues, if a player got back from Metrofan without helping Yura.

Quest.Title: trigger2
Quest.Description: This trigger shows if a player knows what has become of Yura.
Is needed for the permission to go and get the backpack once and all its copies later on.

Quest.Title: Crazy Tea-Party
Quest.Description: The Hatter asked you to get him a pack of tea.

Quest.Title: Catch the thief
Quest.Description: The thief stole an artefact from the trader and ran to the border to sell it. It's necessary to catch him before he'll achieve the goal.

Quest.Title: Catch the Thief
Quest.Description: You need to catch the thief named %NPC0% before he achieves his goal. He's mobing along the road passing the radio tower.
Quest.onWin: You killed the thief!
Quest.onFailed: Yopu've failed...

Quest.Title: Catch the Thief
Quest.Description: Go back to the stalker and get your reward.

Quest.Title: Noise in the Wood
Quest.Description: Grishkovets asked you to go into the dead wood in the swamp and tell him about wood anomalies.

Quest.Title: Noise in the Wood
Quest.Description: Visit the Dead Wood in the swamp. (H14-2)
Quest.onWin: These trees are lifeless. Dead air and the smell of bog water fill the atmosphere. No anomalies can be seen about. Get back to Grishkovets.

Quest.Title: Noise in the Wood
Quest.Description: Return to Grishkovets and tell him about the dead wood.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly can sell another one Sig 751.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly wants 4 "Screens α".

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly wants 2 "Stabilizers α".

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Bring 3 "Antigravs α" to Sly.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly needs 2 "Rubbers α".

Quest.Title: Find Hitrec
Quest.Description: Sly wants 5 Vesuvius.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly needs 4 Spiderkhan's legs.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly wants another recommendation from Simonov.

Quest.Title: Sig 751 assault rifle
Quest.Description: Sly wants 200 000 roubles. Greedy bastard.

Quest.Title: Texas justice
Quest.Description: Bandit %NPC0% managed to rob the trader and kill his friend. Kill that "son-of-a...".
Quest.onWin: You killed the bandit!
Quest.onFailed: You have failed your quest...

Quest.Title: Body parts. Part 1
Quest.Description: Bring the Verliock's wing to Crocodile for his mutant part's dummy.

Quest.Title: Body parts. Part 2
Quest.Description: Bring the Sylvan's skin to Crocodile.

Quest.Title: Body parts. Part 3
Quest.Description: Bring the Fiend's arms to Crocodile.

Quest.Title: Body parts. Part 4
Quest.Description: Bring the Big Bear's head to Crocodile.
Palka's contact looks like homeless. He could be on the railway station or near the town walls.

Quest.Title: Temon's Mystery
Quest.Description: Sanek is worried about Temon. He wants you to find out what exactly has become of him.
Temon is hiding in a cave on New Land. He's cold, frightened and delusioned.

Quest.Title: Unusual Quilted Jacket, part 4
Quest.Description: There's no magic inside the wardrobe. Blacksmith buys the same jacket through intermediaries every day and put it back in the wardrobe. Old stalkers are just making fun of the local, who believes that new jacket appears in the wardrobe every day.

Quest.Title: A scientist in a cage
Quest.Description: Near the camp of scientists, not far from the Mount Vesuvius, there is a cage in which one of the researchers voluntarily closed himself... It is necessary to interview scientists in the camp and find out why their colleague makes so dangerous and strange research.

Quest.Title: Give the data
Quest.Description: Give the data to Patisson after mutants shooting.

Quest.Title: Kill the Outcasts
Quest.Description: Kill 20 outcasts in 30 minutes. You can't use health treatment or leave the anomalous Zone.

Quest.onFailed: You applied health treatment...
You left the anomalous Zone...
You died before you complete the quest...
You have missed the time limit...
You have missed the time limit ...
You died before you complete the quest...
You left the anomalous Zone...
You applied health treatment...

Quest.Title: Kill a Jelly
Quest.Description: Kill a jelly in 15 minutes. You can't use health treatment or leave the anomalous Zone.

Quest.Title: To Tunguska
Quest.Description: Permeated the importance of the task Nicheporenko (as an exception) allowed a single pilot transfer to Tunguska with the help of Kolya Tesla invention.
Kolya Tesla can send to Tunguska for 5 electric parts. But only once.
The parts collected. Kolya Tesla is ready to start his experiment.

Quest.Title: Shperling's trader
Quest.Description: Sperling appreciated the help and is willing to share the secrets of his organization.

Quest.Title: New Armor
Quest.Description: Get your reward from a barterer of mercenaries using the reccomendations Shperling has given you.

Quest.Title: Buy The Information
Quest.Description: Rusk will tell how to break away, if you pay him 10 000 rubles.

Quest.Title: Freedom in exchange for tobacco
Quest.Description: Bring to Suhar a carton of cigarettes out of the closet, which is located in the barracks, opposite the exit from the parade ground.

Quest.Title: Food for engineer
Quest.Description: Engineer of alcoholic beverage plant and his assistant are out of food.
Bring them a box of canned goods.

Quest.Title: Dog Hunter
Quest.Description: Engineer slew 20 dogs nearby. He challenges you to break his record.
The engineer sits in his shelter. Kill at least 10 dogs near the tower for a good show.
Bring 21 heads to the engineer. Any dogs will do.

Quest.Title: Dog Hunter. Part 2
Quest.Description: Engineer killed 23 dogs and took their heads undamaged. Break his record again and bring him 23 dog heads.

Quest.Title: Need some help
Quest.Description: Engineer of the liquor facility needs a couple of alcoh... assistants to drop out of his alcoholism.
Valera from the palace of culture wants to stop drinking too. Go speak with the engineer about Valera.
Captain Feck-o looks like sober. You can speak with the engineer about his progress.
The engineer master knows about captain's and Valera's progress in getting sober. Now the engineer must make his choice.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Gray spiders"
Quest.Description: Dr. Eizenstein asked you to bring him 5 grey spider legs from the laboratory. You can enter the laboratory only with a group of armed stalkers.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Gray spiders"
Quest.Description: Kill all spiders in the laboratory. South-eastern side of M12 square.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Gray spiders"
Quest.Description: Collect 5 spider legs and bring them to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Fine samples"
Quest.Description: You need to visit 3 areas and collect 5 good quality spider legs in each area. 1st area -- O11 square -- cany spiders; 2nd area -- H9 square -- peat spiders; 3rd area -- H8 square -- woody spiders.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Fine samples"
Quest.Description: Find cany spiders in O11 square and collect 5 spider legs.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Fine samples"
Quest.Description: Bring cany spider legs to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Fine samples"
Quest.Description: Find peat spiders in H9 square and collect 5 spider legs.
Bring peat spider legs to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Fine samples"
Quest.Description: Find woody spiders in H8 square and collect 5 spider legs.
Bring woody spider legs to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Bear claws"
Quest.Description: Bring couple of bear claws to the scientists.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Bear claws"
Quest.Description: Find someone to help you. Then kill a young bear and collect it's claws.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Bear claws"
Quest.Description: Bring the claws to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Missing scientist"
Quest.Description: You need to find missing scientist in the marked area. Get information about his progress.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Missing scientist"
