Quest.Description: Dr. Voronin do some researches not far away from the chemical wastes burial site in H14 area. Find him and speak with him about his work.

Quest.Title: Engine of science:"Missing scientist"
Quest.onWin: You've managed to ward off the spiders. Now you can speak with Voronin.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Missing scientist"
Quest.Description: Go back to Eisenstein and tell him about Voronin's problems. Don't forget to get your reward.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Scientists want to research mutant body parts (which mutants use as a weapon agains humans). It can be very helpful in different inventions against mutant agression.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill list: spider, dog, hog, rat, bear, blyak and verliocka.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a mutated spider and collect his jaws.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a dog mutant. Collect it's jaws.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a hog. Collect it's hoof.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a rat and collect it's skull.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a bear and collect it's claws.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a blyak and collect it's claw.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Kill a verliocka and collect it's claw.

Quest.Title: Engine of science: "Body parts"
Quest.Description: Bring all the body parts to Dr.Eisenstein.

Quest.Title: empty quest for the dialogue filtration
Check the stadium area
Quest.Description: Go check the situation at the stadium and report back to Kvashina.

Quest.Title: Check the situation at the stadium area
Quest.Description: Go to the stadium in the Ж12 area. Check the situation there.
Quest.onWin: Stadium is abandoned. But you can hear the mutant dog barking.

Quest.Title: Check the situation at the stadium area
Quest.Description: Go back to Kvashina and report him abot the situation on the stadium.

Quest.Title: Kill a hog
Quest.Description: Find and kill a hog to check your skills.

Quest.Title: Working For the Public Good
Quest.Description: Retired Colonel will speak for you in exchange for 6 peat bog spider legs.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Medicine
Quest.Description: Get 9 spider legs and one verliock leg to the Pharmacist.
To equip a weapon, drag it from the Inventory to an empty slot in the Equipment Window. Or press the "Right Mouse Button" on a weapon icon and choose "Equip".
To equip a weapon, drag it from the Inventory to an empty slot in the Equipment Window. Or press the "Right Mouse Button" on a weapon icon and choose "Equip".
Now you have a weapon.
Open your backpack and equipment by holding down the CTRL key and pressing "Backpack" (shortkey "I") and "Equipment" (shortkey "U") buttons on the screen.

Quest.Title: Road to Liubech
Quest.Description: Station Watchman allowed you to use the draisine that is near the northern tunnel. Now talk to Kochegarov if you're ready to head off to Liubech.

Quest.Title: Speak with Greek
Quest.Description: All passing stalkers should speak with Greek. Greek can be found on one of the top floors of the militia building.
Wait while Alex swaps the packages.
Quest.onWin: The fake package is ready. Take it from Alex.

Quest.Description: Stick waits for the package outside the militia station.
Check benches in the park.

item.title: Посылка
item.description: Товар, который ждет Палка у входа в здание милиции.

Quest.Description: Dead enemies leave valuables. Urchins, for example, hunt rats and so they leave rat tails after death.
Not everyone can do what the Foreman has done. But the wit can compensate the lack of experience.
First you need to kill 23 dogs near the tower. The Foreman must believe that hunting is in full swing.
Bring 23 intact dog heads to the engineer. Hardly he can distinguish the heads of the local dogs from any other dog heads.
The engineer master counts kills by sound... And as the agreement was on 23 dogs, it is not necessary to kill more than demanded quantity round the tower, differently the master may lose count.
Quest.onFailed: You killed 24 dogs. The engineer lost count.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Medicine
Quest.Description: Get nine spider legs to the Pharmacist.

Quest.Title: Anomalous Medicine
Quest.Description: Get one verliock leg to the Pharmacist.

Quest.Title: Talk to Alex
Quest.Description: Greek recommended to speak with Alex, local security chief.

Quest.Title: Military Secret
Quest.Description: Get reports from Kvashina and bring them to Tatar.
Find corporal Kvashina at a the military post in Liubech.

item.title: Отчеты
item.description: Секретные документы, украденные ефрейтором Квашина для Татарина.

Quest.Description: Get the reports to Tatar in the swamps.

Quest.Title: Spider Notes
Quest.Description: Tatar writes "Spider Notes" for the retired colonel. He asked you to get the notes to Nicheporenko, whose post is in Gourmet's Village.

item.title: Заметки о пауках
item.description: "Заметки о пауках" -- научное исследование энтузиаста. Попытка осмысления характера, повадок и природы болотного паука-мутанта.

Quest.Title: Way of Knowing
Quest.Description: Visit certain locations in order to learn more about the Zone. Get back to Michail when you are done.

Quest.Title: Way of Knowing
Quest.Description: Check out the stadium. Strange things happen there frequently.
Quest.onWin: It's just an ordinary stadium. Nothing special.

Quest.Title: Way of Knowing
Quest.Description: Visit Ryabinushka where anomalous energy attracts mutants.
Quest.onWin: You feel dizzy. But it passes quickly.

Quest.Title: Way of Knowing
Quest.Description: Visit the area around new buildings.
Quest.onWin: You feel that your body is being filled up with an anbearable feeling of heaviness. It's getting difficult to breathe...The next moment you feel fine again.

Quest.Title: Kill Three Verliocks
Quest.Description: Trace three verliocks, kell them and get back to the Light Mentor.

Quest.Title: Collecting Details of the Artifact
Quest.Description: Get Five "Shield α" artifacts.

Quest.Title: Cleaner
Quest.Description: Cleanse the area outside the base of the White.

Quest.Title: Cleaner
Quest.Description: Clean the area otside the baze of teh White off mutated spiders.

Quest.Title: Cleaner
Quest.Description: Clean the area otside the baze of teh White off mutated boars.

Quest.Title: Cleaner
Quest.Description: Clean the area otside the baze of teh White off verliocks.
Get back to the village of the White and take the reward from the Light Mentor.

item.title: Рапорт
item.description: Из срочного донесения подполковника Пышченко. "...За прошедшие сутки мутанты продвинулись на пять километров в сторону периметра. Они окружают Любеч. Мы "завариваем" все входы и выходы из Зоны. Территория останется полностью изолированной, пока угроза прорыва мутантов не будет устранена. Рекомендую ускорить доставку кандидатов, задействовав вертолеты. Риск оправдан. Мы не знаем, когда представится возможность еще одной доставки, если таковая потребуется. До тех пор "Пещере" придется умерить свой аппетит и работать с тем что есть..."

item.title: Рапорт
item.description: "...Связь с внешним миром потеряна. Сперва сквозь помехи еще пробивались отдельные слова, но теперь в эфире только шум... Эти... твари... ломятся в двери. Каждый метр не дается им без боя, но уроды никак не отступят... Полковник Некифоров объявил общую эвакуацию. Выжившие попытаются добраться до Новой Земли... пешком. Вся надежда на "Пещеру". Если Объект-Х уже в руках ботанов и мутанты не добрались до них... у нас появится шанс пережить грядущую бойню..."

item.title: Рапорт
item.description: "...Пока бес не порвал ему шею, профессор говорил, что пространство Зоны едино, даже если часть ее находится здесь, а часть -- на Новой Земле. Мол, до "Пещеры" не долгие дни пути, а практически рукой подать. Не понимаю, как такое возможно, но полковник ему верит. Теперь, когда одна нога профессора здесь, а другая в конце коридора, и из глотки его льется бурая кровь, вместо извилистых теорий, он уже никогда не сможет внятно объяснить, что именно имел в виду. Придется поверить на слово. У нас есть координаты. Если старик был прав, опытный пилот, нацелившись точно на них, сможет совершить переход..."

item.title: Письмо №2
item.description: Второе письмо с угрозами: "Похоже, я недостаточно ясно выразился в прошлый раз. Ты не только продолжаешь ходить за мной, ты [CENSORED] помешал мне убить этого Митьку. В итоге я потерял заказ. Если [CENSORED] по-хорошему не понимаешь, мой баррет все объяснит. Ходи, [CENSORED], теперь оглядываясь!" Подпись: Г.О.Б.

Quest.Description: Blacksmith wants the jacket back. Find Dumpster and ask him who he sold the jacket to. You'll find the guy not far from Vesuvius, in square A5
Dumpster told you that he'd sold the jacket to a man from Liubech. He lives somewhere in the swamp.
It's up to you to decide who you want to give the jacket - Blacksmith or its true owner, one of the locals.

Quest.onWin: Orlov's journal found.

item.title: Журнал Орлова Григория
item.description: Выполненные задания: Первые шаги, "Серый" пистолет, Работа от Кислого, Просьба Кузнеца, Артефакт "Разбитый Экран", Детский тир, Недетский тир, Отчеты для Дибенко, Починить рацию, Курьер: "Испытание", Курьер: "Лапки для ученых", Экспедиция Симонова, Починить клетку Патиссона, Бегущий по лезвию. Текущие задания: Задание Симонова [провалено], Задание Черешникова, Убить Ужасающего Паукана, Темный Сталкер, Поиски беглецов, "Винторез", Помочь Мастеру ЛВЗ.

Quest.Title: Task from Simonov
Quest.Description: Somonov is studying the boarders of the anomalous area around the Vesuvius and he needs help from a stalker who could get to the very end points of the anomalous zone equipped with a special device.
Get to the end point of the square A10.
Quest.onWin: You've checked the point in square A10. The data has been sent.

Quest.Title: "Antigrav" for Simonov
Quest.Description: Simonov doesn't seem to be willing to tell anything about a man with a barrett, but he asked you to get him a very rare artifact called "Antigrav α". Who knows, maybe if you do it, he'll make sure he could trust you.

Quest.Title: Get the Sientist out of the Cage
Quest.Description: Doctor Patisson has locked up himself in a cage not far from the sientists' camp. Simonov promises to reward anyone who can make Patisson leave the cage.

Quest.Title: Morozov's box.
Quest.Description: Morozov wants to know where is his box from Lubech. Find Sthaket and take the box from him.
Find Shtaket.
Take the box.

item.title: Посылка Морозову
item.description: Посылка, которую Морозов давно ждет. Если приложить ее к уху, можно разобрать подозрительное тиканье.

Quest.Description: Bring the box to Morozov.

Quest.onWin: The box released the strange gas.
The box exploded.

Quest.Description: There was a bomb in the box. I need ti ask Shtaket about this surprise.
Alex took the box from me.
I need to speak with Morozov about the box.

Quest.Title: Time to collect rocks...
Quest.Description: Morozov asked to find his frind's body.

item.title: Письмо
item.description: Письмо доказывает, что вещи, которые Крученый сдал на хранение наемному кладовщику, на самом деле собственность Морозова.

Quest.Description: Find the Bank Naemnik, show him Morozov's letter and get Twisted's stuff from him.
Find the third courier. He left in the direction of Lubech and was going to pass by a burial ground of chemical waste.
Quest.onWin: Dead courier. No wounds could be seen. The reason of death is unknown. You've found a big round rock in his pocket.

Quest.Description: Find the first courier. He tried to round Vesuvius and reach the camp of scientists.
Quest.onWin: Dead courier. No wounds could be seen. The reason of death is unknown. You've found a big round rock in his pocket.

Quest.Description: I need to find the couriers.
Find the second courier. He went towards Ryabinushka through the marsh.
Quest.onWin: Dead courier. No wounds could be seen. The reason of death is unknown. You've found a big round rock in his pocket.

Quest.Description: The couriers are dead. They had some strange rocks with them.
Do all the job.
Show strange rocks to Simonov. He can be found at the eastern side of Vesuvius.
Burn the couriers' bodies.
Burn the first courier.
Burn the sexond courier.
Burn the third courier.
Get Morozov's stuff.
Bring the toys to Morozov.

item.title: Доклад
item.description: Доклад доктора Шерстнова: "...Кандидат №1031 -- потеря контроля, нервный срыв. Состояние: мертв. Причина: в припадке разбил голову о стекло. ___ Кандидат №1032 -- усвоил препарат М, но препарат Н вызвал сильную аллергическую реакцию. Состояние: мертв. Причина: разрыв сердца. ___ Кандидат №1033 -- резкий рост мускульной силы. Во время операции вышел из-под наркоза и убил доктора Панова отобранным у него скальпелем. Кандидат успел разрезать собственные вены прежде, чем было произведено задержание. Состояние: мертв. Причина: сильная потеря крови, в результате многочисленных ранений, нанесенных кандидатом самому себе..."

Quest.Description: Let Sherstnov go.
Take 30 000
Take 50 000

item.title: Письмо №3
item.description: Третье письмо недоброжелателя: "Твои друзья совсем меня затравили... Так и быть. Все. С меня хватит. Ты победил. Пора на покой. Я давно готовил путь отступления. Не пытайся найти меня. Я завязал. Больше не будет смертей. Не от моей руки. Отсюда пути наши расходятся, незнакомец. Навсегда... А чтобы не было соблазна тебя пристрелить, я продал свой баррет... Быть может, торговец оставил его себе или перепродал в чужие руки... Впервые в жизни чувствую себя предателем... Если ты найдешь или выкупишь мое ружье, позаботься о нем, сталкер..." Подпись: Г.О.

item.title: Рапорт
item.description: Из рапорта подполковника Пышченко. "...Получена шифровка из "Пещеры": "Закончен осмотр группы №89, Объект-Х не найден". Следующая партия кандидатов прибудет через три дня. Доставка в Зону прежняя: поезд и грузовики. Легенда: припасы и оружие для постов в Любече..."

Quest.Title: Find out more where Old stalker is from.
Fried Meat for Station Watchman
Quest.Description: Station Watchman promises to reward you if you get him 2 slabs of fried meat.To make a fire and cook over it you need to collect "Wood", "Matches" and "Meat" items. Press "P" to open "Craft" and "I" to open "Inventory" windows. Choose "Make a Fire" in the crafting grid. Move "Wood" and "Matches" from your inventory into the crafting grid and press the "Craft" button. Now you have an item "Fire" in your inventory. Choose the item and click the right mouse button, press "use". A fire will appear on the ground in front of her character. Press "F" to cook something over it. Open the inventory and move "Meat" into the "Fire" grid. When the meat is ready, move it back to the inventory. Click the right mouse button on the "Fried Meat", press "Use". The character will eat it.

Quest.Title: Shooting Rage
Quest.Description: Kill the mutants inside the kindergarten (square И13). Sergeant Drachuk should be fully apprised of the results.

Quest.Title: Black Black Market
Quest.Description: Bring Absin the drawing.

Quest.Title: Gross!
Quest.Description: Rats are bothering Fifer and don't let him do his job. Shoot at least 10 rats to smoothen things down for him.

Quest.Title: Priest used to have a dog...
Quest.Description: Local dogs got infected after they ate mutated animal meat. You have to kill at least a dozen of dogs in the village to prevent the virus from spreading further. The mutated dogs are in the south-east corner of square 310.

Quest.Title: Way of Knowing
Quest.Description: Visit the checkpoint.

Quest.Title: Shooting Range
Quest.Description: Sergeant Drachuk asks to kill some rats near the kindergarten.

Quest.Title: Shooting Rage.
Quest.Description: Sergeant Drachuk asks you to kill 5 spiders outside the kindergarten.

Quest.Title: 3 5 minute rounds or till you get 5 scores
Quest.Description: 3 5 minute rounds or till you get 5 scores

Quest.Title: On the way to the station
Quest.Description: If going along the railway you'll get to the station, where you'll find an arm merchant, a doctor and the quide to Lyubech.

Quest.Title: PM for Fifer
Quest.Description: Fifer needs a pistol. He wants to deal with rats on his own. You can either buy PM for him or find one hidden in stashes.

Quest.Title: Gross!
Quest.Description: Shoot 10 rats for Fifer.

Quest.Title: Gross!
Quest.Description: Bring Fifer at least 5 rat tails as an evidence.

Quest.Title: Find the Big Spider and Dispel the Rumor
Quest.Description: Krasnov needs Big Spider leg to carry on his experiments. according to him, the Big Spider has been seen near Liubech in square M2.
Quest.onWin: The traces near a cave in square M2 definitely belong to the Big Spider.

Quest.Title: Kill Big Spider
Quest.Description: So-called Big Spider has left traces near a cave in square M2. The scientists from "Aegis" camp will be happy to get its parts for their examinations and experiments. Kill the beast and give the sientists its leg.

Quest.Title: Krasnov's Recommendations
Quest.Description: Krasnov will give you recommendations that will let you get experimental outfit for eight Big Spider legs. Eight legs at a time, no less.

Quest.Title: Rats
Quest.Description: Rats are bothering Fifer and don't let him do his job. Shoot at least 10 rats to smoothen things down for him.

Quest.Title: Shooting Rage
Quest.Description: Eliminate the mutants in the kindergarten (square И13). Apprise Sergeant Drachuk of the results.

Quest.Title: Shooting Rage
Quest.Description: Sergeant Drachuk asked you to kill some rats outside the kindergarten.

Quest.Title: Shooting Rage
Quest.Description: Sergeant Drachuk asked you to kill 5 spiders outside the kindergarten.

Quest.Title: Music Addict
Quest.Description: Bring Bono the recordings he's been waiting for.

Quest.Title: Priest's Debt
Quest.Description: Priest told you where he had hidden the money. The stash is on a hill in the north-east corner of square И10.

Quest.Title: Куда мне вставить этот чип?...
Quest.Description: Поговорить с неким "Самоделкиным" насчет применения чипа с музыкой.

Quest.Title: Find the Sly
Quest.Description: Simonov has given you the recommendations that help you buya Sig Sauer 751 machine gun from a barterer known as Sly.

Quest.Title: Find the Sly
Quest.Description: The Sly is hiding somewhere either in Liubech or not far from it. Nobody can say where exactly his location is. You need Simonov's recommendation for barter trade with the Sly.

Quest.Title: Оздоровительная прогулка
Quest.Description: Камиль попросил прогуляться по лесу и осмотреть здание на предмет необычностей

Quest.Title: Rare Monster: Rat King
Quest.Description: Find and kill Rat King. Bring its tail to Scar.

Quest.Title: Rare King: Rat King.
Quest.Description: You have an hour to complete the task.
Quest.onFailed: Time's up.

Quest.Title: Rare Monster: Rat King
Quest.Description: You can't kill more than two rats including the Rat King You'll fail the task if you slay more.
Quest.onFailed: You slew 3 rats. Task is failed.

Quest.Title: Rare monster: Rat King
Quest.Description: Kill the Rat King.

Quest.Title: Rare Monster: Rat King
Quest.Description: Bring Scar the tail.

Quest.Title: Shooting
Quest.Description: Press the left mouse button to fire. Press and hold the right mouse button to aim. Press 'R' to reload.

Quest.Title: Search the wood
Quest.Description: Yager asked you to find the source of the shots on the southeast.

Quest.Title: Head off to Luybech
Quest.Description: Talk to Machinist and head off to Luybech.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat Tail
Quest.Description: A dealer from the railway tunnel buys up mutant rat tails.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat Tail
Quest.onFailed: You have left the area and now you can not sell the tail.

Quest.Title: Mutant Rat Tail
Quest.Description: Sell the mutant rat tail to the dealer.

Quest.Title: Sometimes They Do Come Back...
Quest.Description: Mutated dogs came back to the village. Priest says his dog that has gotten infected is still alive. This time he wants you to collect collars of each dog you kill and bring those to him so that he could be sure the alpha dog is dead.

Quest.Title: Sometimes They Do Come Back...
Quest.Description: Collect collars of each dog you kill and get those to Priest.

Quest.Title: Burn 'em Down!
Quest.Description: Priest says that if you burn all doghouses down, mutated dogs will never come back to the village.

Quest.Title: Burn 'em Down!
Quest.Description: There must be some gasoline left in canisters in the nearest village.
Quest.onWin: One bottle must be enough to set doghouses on fire.

Quest.Title: Burn 'em Down!
Quest.Description: Burn all doghouses in the village.

Quest.Title: Burn 'em Down!
Quest.Description: Tell the Priest the task is completed.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: The Priest is worried that his dog is still missing.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Find a hunter who can tell you how to attract the dog.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Find a toilet roll, a bone and brutors' privy.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Find strong brutor's bone.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Find one roll of toilet paper.

item.title: Запах брутора
item.description: Рулон бумаги, пропитанной запахом брутора.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Ambush in the village.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: You need to get brutor's bone to attract the dog.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: You need to get other things that smell brutor like to attract the dog.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Scatter pieces of paper with brutor smell about.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Leave the rest of the paper at entrance of the house.

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down

Quest.Title: Hunting the Dog Down
Quest.Description: Tell the Priest his dog is finally dead and give him its collar.

Quest.Title: Music Addict
Quest.Description: Talk to Pancho. Take the recordings away.

Quest.Title: Music Addict
Quest.Description: Bring Bono the recordings.

Quest.Title: Handmade Sweater
Quest.Description: Fedor wants to knit a sweater out of mutant spider's web.

Quest.Title: Handmade Sweater
Quest.Description: Fedor neувы spider spinning glands.

Quest.Title: Old Warehouse
Quest.Description: An old warehouse is teeming with mutants.
Kill 5 mutant pups inside the warehouse.
Kill 5 rats inside the warehouse.
Apprise Sergeant Drachuk of the results.

Quest.Title: "Sports Day"
Quest.Description: Run round the kindergarten 3 times along the footpath. You have 5 minutes to complete the task. Go back to the sergeant when you're done.

Quest.onFailed: Time's up! The task is failed.

Quest.onWin: You've passed stage 1.

Quest.Description: Apprise Sergeant Drachuk of the completed task.

Quest.onWin: You've passed stage 2.
The distance is covered. Apprise the sergeant of the results.
You've passed stage 3.
You've passed stage 15. Lap 3 out of 3. Hurry up to go back to Sergeant Drachuk.
You've passed stage 4.
You've passed stage 5. Lap 1 out of 3.
You've passed stage 14.
You've passed stage 6.
Yu've passed stage 13.
You've passed stage 7.
You've passed stage 12.
You've passed satge 8.
You've passed stage 11.
You've passed stage 9.

Quest.Description: You got a new quest. Press Ctrl and click the "Open the Jornal" button to open the journal. Or press hot key J.

This is a journal of your tasks. Current and completed ones are presented above. The list of quests is in the left column. The description of chosen task is in the right column. Any task can be canceled and taken again at any time.
Yager asked you to figure out the source of shooting in the wood in the south-west.Press Shift to run.

Quest.Title: Multiple Quests
Quest.Description: Multiple quests can be taken up repeatedly, one time per day. Some of the quests can be repeated again right after being completed.
The station is marked on the map. Press CTRL to open the map and click the "Open GPS Map" button. You can also press 'M' to open the map.
This is a map of the Zone. Press and hold the left mouse button to move the map. Use the scroll wheel on your mouse to change the size of the map. Press ESC to close the map.
If you go along the railways, you'll get to the station, where you'll find an ammo trader, a doctor and a guide who can take you to Liubech.
Use mouse to look around.

Quest.Title: Head Off To Lyubech
Quest.Description: If you're ready to head off to Lyubech go back to the station and talk to Machinist.
Press and hold SHIFT to run.

Quest.Title: Проводник
Quest.Description: Некоторые сталкеры могут провести в новые места, куда иными способами не добраться. Чтобы воспользоваться их услугами, понадобятся деньги или выполнение заданий.

Quest.Title: Dialogues
Quest.Description: Approach to Yager, you'll see a special icon for interaction.

Quest.Title: Tutorial
Quest.Description: Press "F" to talk to Yager.

Quest.Title: Drunk Stalker's Stash.
Quest.onWin: There are only one gun and rounds in the stash.

Quest.Title: Stewed Meat for a Gun
Quest.Description: One drunken stalker told Grisha the trader where the nilitary had hidden their weapon. The stash is in square Д2-3, under a bush. Grisha pomised to give you one can of stewed meat for each gun.
Get Grisha a gun from the stash.

Quest.Title: The Big Bang Theory
Quest.Description: Find out about more about the explosion on the military base
Найти военного Фому Киняева и расспросить его о происшествии
Наёмнику Бостону явно есть, что рассказать

Quest.Title: Военная дипломатия
Quest.Description: Решить проблему с Братством
Узнать у Пильщика про Братство
Убить трёх заговорщиков.
Поговорить с Пильщиком
На теле Толяна не оказалось оружия. Но следы ведут в сторону озера. Возможно, следует проверить, соблюдая осторожность -- Егерь предупреждал насчет воды.

Quest.Title: Equipment
Quest.Description: Now you have a gun.
Press and hold Tab, click the "Open Backpack" button (I) and "Examine Equipment" button (U).
Drag a weapon from the inventory into an empty slot of the window of equipment to equip it. You can also click the right mouse button on a weapon and choose "Equip".
The station is marked on the map. Press "M" to see the map.

Это карта зоны. Для просмотра карты используйте клавиши стрелок и приближения \ удаления. Также для перемещения карты можно использовать зажатую левую клавишу мыши, а для изменения масштаба — колесико мыши. Чтобы закрыть карту, используйте клавишу ESC.
Если пойти вдоль путей, можно добраться до железнодорожной станции, где есть продавец оружия, врач и сталкер, готовый отвести в Любеч.
Используйте клавиши WASD для передвижения.
Идите к Бродяге, пока не увидите иконку взаимодействия.
Press "F" to interact.

Quest.Title: Кризис веры
Quest.Description: Причиной запоя бывшего Мастера ЛВЗ стал кризис веры. Обретя бога, он потерял его на следующий же день. Несомненно, в Зоне найдутся люди, чьи религиозные и философские убеждения помогут Мастеру оправиться от удара и снова встать на ноги.
The Priest helped the Foreman recover his faith.
Философия Болотника позволит обрести покой в душе и научит культурному употреблению алкоголя.
The White Brotherhood will welcome a new member with open arms.
Fedya the Prophet believes that mutants will triumph in the end.
Zelenkin says that Hermit from the Vesuvius traded with the White who are suspected of kidnapping the pilot.
Hermit was trying to burn the letter he got form the White but he was interrupted by mutants and ran away, having left the letter on the ground in square Д2.
The letter says the pilot was left dying in the cellar of a forsaken house in Novikovo.

item.title: Блокнот пилота Н.С. Щавелева
item.description: ...Эти кретины пытались сломить меня, но не смогли. Они ушли. Бросили меня тут. За прошедшие дни я почти утратил надежду, но похоже удача снова улыбнулась мне. Блокнот все еще со мной и я нашел кусок грифеля, застрявший в камнях. Если случится худшее... Путник, кто бы ты ни был, знай, что мы остались без связи с внешним миром. Я должен был забрать последних людей, но потерял управление в небе над Любечем. Перед падением я понял, что вертолет попал в аномалию. Я передал сообщение на Эхо-7. Ответа не было... Наша миссия чрезвычайно важна. От нее зависит судьба человечества. Фанатики не понимают... Они с радостью встретят грядущие перемены. Но мы, нормальные люди, должны бороться до последнего вздоха... Я сильно ранен и измучен пытками, но могу двигаться ползком. Теперь нужно раскачать трубу, которая держит мои цепи... Подвал не заперт, я смогу выбраться, как только освобожусь. Но что-то есть в темноте. Я чувствую его зловонное дыхание и слышу, как оно облизывается... Чертова тварь... Наверное, щенок или крыса...

Quest.Description: Tell Dibenko what heppened to the pilot.
Find the second copter. Find out what heppened to the pilot.
Quest.onWin: The pilot is dead. The body had acid poured over so only bones are left.

Quest.Description: Find the third helicopter. Find out what happened to the pilot.
Quest.onWin: The pilot is dead. He managed to get away from the copter but failed against the mutants.

Quest.Description: Sergeant wants to know what exactly happened to the pilots. Try to find it out and inform him.

Quest.Title: Echo-7 Base.
Quest.Description: Connection with Echo-7 Secret Base is lost. Due to the dead pilot's notes, the trucks must have delivered people to that base.

Quest.Title: Письмо Михаилу
Quest.Description: Брат Григорий, перед тем как совершить ритуальное самосожжение в недрах Везувия, написал письмо наставнику Михаилу, лидеру Белого Братства. Письмо так и не было доставлено адресату.

item.title: Письмо брата Григория наставнику Михаилу
item.description: Великий Наставник, глас Всевышнего... я, смиренный твой ученик, прошу помилования за свой грех. Ни веление земли, ни воля Братства не указывали нам путь. Это сделал человек, скрывший лицо свое под капюшоном. Он говорил о слабости пришлых. Говорил, что час пробил. Но он солгал нам. Меня ввело в заблуждение падение вертолета. Я принял это за знак. Я смотрел, как пилот пришлых переносит ранения, пытки... я видел страх в его глазах... и мне открылось -- мы убиваем его без причины, без надобности. Зона все решила за нас, уже давно. В подвале дома, в Новиково, я оставил его умирать. За это прошу милости и прощения. Я... а также братья мои. Мы шли дорогой кривой, заблудились и долго ходили во тьме. Пламя красной горы поможет обрести покой через боль и вернет наши грешные души в Источник.

Quest.Description: Get to the north east point of the Vesuvius on the boarder between squares K2 and K3.
Quest.onWin: You've checked the point in square K2. The data has been sent.

Quest.Description: Get to the end point of the square A1.
Quest.onWin: You've checked the point in square A1. The data has been sent.

Quest.Description: Get to the end point of the square K10.
Quest.onWin: You've checked the point in square K10. The data has been sent.

Quest.Description: Get back to Simonov, he'll tell you the results of the measurements.

Quest.Title: Artifacts For Dibenko
Quest.Description: Dibenko wants to use artifacts to make his soldiers stronger.
Find a "Pillow α" artifact.
Find four "Rubber α" artifacts.
Find 10 "Marevo" artifacts.
Tell Dibenko that all the needed artifacts are collected.

Quest.Title: Temon's Clone
Quest.Description: Temon said he'd killed his own clone. If what he's saying is true and he had come across an anomaly that's capable of cloning people, someone in the Zone must know something about that.

Quest.Title: Save Temon.
Quest.Description: Chereshnikov saysTemon can be fixed up. All you need is to find a proper doctor...
Zelenkin is the one who can make the decoction for Temon. The main ingredient he needs is a verliock paw.
Zelenkin needs potions to make the decoction.
Get two bottle of "Ryabinovka" balsam for Zelenkin.
Four "Brusnikovka" for Zelenkin.
Get Zelenkin 2 bottles of "Chertovka" balsam.
Get the med from Zelenkin.
Vet agreed to make the decoction. The main ingredient he needs is Verliock paw. Also he wants to have boar leg and tooth, two artifacts: "Shield α" and "Stabilizer α" as a reward.
Get a Verliock paw.
Get a boar tooth for Vet.
Get a boar leg for Vet.
Get "Shield α" for Vet.
Get the "Stabilizer α" for Vet.
Get the med from Vet.
Give Temon the medicine.

Quest.Title: Cigarettes For Temon
Quest.Description: Temon finally came round. Now he eagers to have the cigarettes Ivy gave him once at the Lubech station.

Quest.Title: Spirit for Temon
Quest.Description: Temon wants to stay on New Land. Local stalkers will let him stay if he gives them 20 bottles of spirit.

Quest.Title: Collecting parts for As-Val
Quest.Description: Assembler was amazed how skillfull and fast all the parts for "Vintorez" were collected. Now he wants you to collect the parts for As-Val. He doesn't promise anything in return cause he believes that "true assembler' will do the task for nothing.
Find 15 silencers for As-Val. Bring them to Assembler.
Collect 15 As-Val corps for Assembler.
Find 15 stocks for As-Val. Bring them to Assembler.
Find 15 As-Val magazines for Assembler.
Remind Assembler that all the parts needed have been collected.

Quest.Title: Weapon and Art for teh Foreman
Quest.Description: Sobered up, the Foreman noticed that it got harder to fight the mutants. He needs a TOZ-34 shotgun and a "Screen a" artifact to give him enough courage to act.
Find a TOZ-34 shotgun for the Foreman.
Find the "Screen a" artifact for the Foreman.
Ask the Foreman how he's doing.

Quest.Title: Mission from Chereshnikov
Quest.Description: Chereshnikov is studying the anomalous zone round Vesuvius. He needs help from a a salker who can get to the very bound of the zone with a special equipment.
Find the northernmost point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: You found the northernmost point of the Vesuvius. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Find the southernmost point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: You found the southernmost point of the Vesuvius. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Find the easternmost point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: You found the easternmost point of the Vesuvius. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Finds the westernmost point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: You found the westernmost point of the Vesuvius. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Find the highest point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: The highest piont is found. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Find the lowest point of the Vesuvius.
Quest.onWin: The lowest point is found. The data is sent.

Quest.Description: Let Chereshnikov know that all the points have been found.
Mentor Mikhail is trying to resolve a conflict peacefully. he wants to persuade newcomers to leave the Zone forever.
Talk to Sergeant Dibenko who ensures security in Liubech.
Talk to Kolya Kisliy, the leader of stalkers in Liubech.
Tell Mihail how the negotiations with the newcomers went.

Quest.onWin: One bottle of spirit will be enough to set doghouses on fire.

Quest.Description: Получить ружье.
Получить пропуск.
Поговорить с Охриповым.

Quest.Title: Tools for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs a repair kit to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Wire for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 rolls of copper wire to fix the antenna.

Quest.Title: Cut Wires for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 cut wires to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Insulating Tape for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 insulating tapes to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Vacuum Tubes for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 vacuum tubes to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Radio Parts for Morse.
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 radio parts to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Transformers for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs 20 transformers to accomplish that.

Quest.Title: Generators for Morse
Quest.Description: Morse is trying to fix the radio tower. He needs generators to accomplish that.
Отдать ружье.
Отдать пропуск.
Find main generator for a transmission unit.
Morse suggested that an engineer who is familiar with making and fixing radio sets can help.
Basmach had words with Druz and now he wants to teach him a lesson. He's planning to sneak the generator from Druz's post.Only to succeed he needs someone to distract Druz's attention.
Get back to Basmach and find out if he managed to "borrow" the generator.

item.title: Задающий генератор
item.description: Задающий генератор, который нужен Морзе, чтобы починить радиовышку. Морзе просил принести два генератора: один для приемника и один для передатчика.

Quest.Description: Find master generator for the transmission unit.
Morse thinks that the military from Liubech have the main generator.
Courier is sure the white killed the worker and stole the spare generator.
Михаил отрицает причастность своих "братьев" к убийству курьера и к краже генератора. Он говорит, что это могли быть "репки", бандиты, мародерствующие в окрестностях Любеча.

item.title: Задающий генератор
item.description: Задающий генератор, который нужен Морзе, чтобы починить радиовышку. Морзе просил принести два генератора: один для приемника и один для передатчика.

Quest.Description: Give Morse the generators.
Bargain.
Agree on 20 000.
Agree on 12 000.
Pay.
Agree on 50 000.
Agree on 5 000.
Find and explore the Echo-7 base. (Vesuvius. Square Г2).

The base was destroyed. Lots of people died, those who managed to survive teleported to New Land through an anomaly. There's an information about some experiments, that were held in the zone, in the documents found. Go back to Dibenko and tell him what you've found out.

Quest.Title: Resident Evil
Quest.Description: A group of mutated animals appeared in the labs not far from the former soviet base on New Land.
Selektevich is bothered with their appearance and he wants to find evidences that there are new sub-species.

item.title: Доклад
item.description: "...Кандидат №753 подвергся трансплантации аномальных генов. Мы увеличили дозу облучения. Результат: полный провал. Инородная ткань поглотила человеческие клетки. Сила и выносливость возросли, но интеллект упал до неприемлемого уровня. Подопытный ведет себя агрессивно. Рекомендуем провести ликвидацию..."

Quest.Description: Show the papers to Seletkevich.

Quest.Title: Samples For Selektevich
Quest.Description: Get new mutants DNA samples for Selektevich.

Quest.onWin: Find undamaged sample of mutated tissue.

Quest.Description: Bring the found sample to Selectevich
Support Sherstnov.
Support Selektevich.

Quest.Title: Dibenko's Report
Quest.Description: Tell Dibenko about the accident on New Land.
Agree to help Dibenko.
Refuse to help Dibenko.

item.title: Письмо
item.description: Письмо с угрозами от какого-то недоброжелателя: "Кто бы ты ни был, хорош ходить за мной попятам. Я человек прямой, без лукавства, говорю как есть. Еще раз увижу, что ты меня преследуешь, -- пущу пулю промеж глаз. Чихнуть не успеешь и никогда не поймешь, с какой стороны она прилетит. Не шути с барретом. Баррет всегда смеется последним..." Подпись: Г.О.Б.

Quest.Title: Artifacts for Mitka
Quest.Description: Mitka will tell you more about the man with a barrett in exchange for some artifacts.
Get the "Conductor" artifacts.
Get the "Heater" artifact.

Quest.Title: New Year's Gifts
Quest.Description: Bags full of gifts are thrown about all over the Zone. Morozov's assistants failed to deliver them. Morozov is ready to get the gifts back for a consideration.
Morozov needs 10 balls.
Morozov is looking for 10 teddy bears.
Morozov is looking for 10 Rubic's Cubes.
Morozov will buy 3 roly-poly toys.
Morozov will buy 10 father frost toys.
Morozov will buy 10 glass cones.

Quest.Title: Big Hunt
Quest.Description: Morozov will give his old cynologist suit to a man who is brave enough to kill 10 mutants of each species and 3 mutants of each known subspecies. When you are done, go back to Morozov.
Slay 10 mutant rats.
Kill 3 rats inside the military warehouse in Liubech.
Kill 3 rats in Lubech Kindergarten.
Slay 3 rats in Eisenstein's Lab.
Kill 3 rats at Fifer's post.
Slay 3 rat kings.
Slay 10 mutant puppies.
Slay 10 mutant dogs.
Kill 3 mutated pups inside the abandoned military warehouse in Liubech.
Kill 3 dogs not far from the former militia station in Liubech.
Kill 3 big stags in Liubech.
Slay 3 mutant puppies outside the village not far from the station.
Kill 3 mutanted dogs at the stadium.
Kill 3 mutated dogs that are chaising the pope.
Kill 3 mutated pups that are hiding behind the former militia station.
Kill 3 mutated dogs outside the Distilled Spirits Plant.
Slay 10 mutant spiders.
Kill 3 spiders inside the kindergarten in Liubech.
Slay 3 spiders in Eisenstein's Lab.
Kill 3 wood spiders.
Kill 3 peat spiders.
Kill 3 cany spiders.
Kill 3 spiders by the chemical waste disposal.
Kill 3 big spiders (or dispel the rumor about their existance).
Slay 10 mutant boars.
Slay 10 mutant bears.
Slay 10 verliocks.
Slay 10 fiends.
Kill 3 lame fiends.
Kill 3 lab animals.
Slay 10 blyaks.
Slay 3 blyacks in Eisenstein's Lab.
Slay 10 brutors.
Kill 10 sages.
Kill 10 silvans or bogies.
Kill 3 bogies by the station.
Kill 10 forsaken creatures.
Kill 10 jellies.

Quest.Title: New Year Quests
Quest.Description: Blocking New Year quests.

Quest.Title: Scientific Work
Quest.Description: Patisson explained why he'd been sitting in the cage. If what he believes is is true, Simonov might be interested in Patisson's work.

item.title: Научный труд
item.description: Работа Патиссона, в которой он подробно описал теорию поглощения Фоном генетического материала человека, а также привел свои многодневные наблюдения за поведением мутантов.

Quest.Description: Since Simonov is the head of the expidition, he can provide Patisson with whatever is required, but only if he considers Patisson's work important.
Doc Flayer won't be happy if Patisson recieves support.

Quest.Title: Crouch
Quest.Description: Press "С" to crouch.

Quest.Title: Этого недостаточно
Quest.Description: принять камни и снова послать за другим

Quest.Title: Working for the public good
Quest.Description: Soldier Serov will tel you what work you must perform. He'll give you a voucher for every completed task. Collect 10 vouchers and show them to Kozhemyaka.

Quest.Title: Взять камень
Quest.Description: отнести камень

Quest.Title: Find Khromtsov, talk to him and take away a stone.
Отнести камень
Quest.Description: Отнести камень к платформе и доложить об этом рядовому Серову.

Quest.Title: Clearing off the Area.
Quest.Description: Необходимо помочь расчистить территорию рядом с зоной, для расширения ее площади. Бригадир Хромцов находится за бараками, у скалы, он укажет фронт работ.

Quest.Title: Talk to Drum
Quest.Description: Find Charon's stash.

Quest.Title: Get the knife back.
Quest.Description: I need to take this knife to Kochegarov.

Quest.Title: Find Charon stash.
Quest.Description: Kochegarov asked to find the knife, which he lost to Charon. Most likely, Charon kept the knife at home or somewhere nearby, in the stash.

Quest.Title: Talk to Courier
Quest.Description: Blacksmith tells you to talk to Courier if you wanna get a job. Courier is not far from the Palace of Culture, in square И12-1.

Quest.Title: Parcel for the Huckster
Quest.Description: Senya Spagetti promised a decend reward for the goods delivered to him from the Zone.Find a huckster in Bandits' Cave and hand him the parcel from Senya in exchange for the goods. The cave is in square О3-4.

Quest.Title: Parcel for the Huckster
Quest.Description: The Huckster gave you a parcel for Senya Spagetti. Take it to the prison and hand to Senya.

Quest.onFailed: You do not have enough money.

Quest.Title: Parcel for Muddy
Quest.Description: Get the parcel Senya Spaghetti has given you to a man named Muddy. He's at the bar in southwestern Vesuvius.

Quest.Title: Message From Muddy
Quest.Description: Find Senya Spaghetti in the Jail and give him the parcel from Muddy.

Quest.Title: Parcel For Pechkin
Quest.Description: Find Pechkin at the Lubech station. Give him the parcel from Senya.

Quest.Title: Parcel From Pechkin
Quest.Description: Find Senya Spaghetti in the Jail and give him the parcel from Pechkin.

Quest.Title: Figure out what is the issue with the connection
Quest.Description: Shepelev promises to reduce the tickets cost if you head for the air navigation tower to figure out why Vetrichenko isn't available and get the weather report from him.

Quest.Title: Hand a Message from Vetrichenko
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko needs at least 10 metres of cable to turn the radio sets on. Go back to Shepelev and tell him so.

Quest.Title: Try to get cable from Shepelev.
Weather Forecast
Quest.Description: Get the weather forecast from Vetrichenko and give it to Shepelev. Don't forget to get the tickets.

Quest.Title: Pass Shepelev's Message To The Pilot
Quest.Description: Tell the pilot that Shepelev allowed you to fly for 10 000.

Quest.Title: Cable for Vetrichenko.
Quest.Description: Shepelev gave the cable, deliver it to Vetrichenko.

Quest.Title: Cheap Tickets
Quest.Description: You may try to get a cheaper ticket. Talk to Shepelev about that. He must be at the control tower.

Quest.Title: On the Way to Jail
Quest.Description: Kapustin will lead you to Jail for 10 vouchers that allows to get out of it.

Quest.Title: Stuff For The Guide
Quest.Description: The Guide from the suburbes of Lubech can help you to get into The Jail. His price is 10 block of cigarettes. 10 bottles of spiritus and 10 slabs of fried meat.
Collect 10 blocks of cigarettes for the Guide.
Collect 10 bottles of spiritus for the Guide.
Collect 10 slabs of fried meat for the Guide.

Quest.Title: AK-74M For The Jail Guide
Quest.Description: To get into The Jail you have to find AK-74M and bring him to one of guardmen of the Jail.

Quest.Title: Shepelev's Susicions
Quest.Description: Shepelev wants you to have a conversation with Salnikov to find out if he's up to something that can harm Shepelev. You will find Salnikov inside a shedder.

Quest.Title: Kill the Impenetrable and Take a Microchip out of its Head
Quest.Description: Salnikov promised to reward you for the chip from the Impenetable's head. The monster can befound on Caravan.

Quest.Title: Tell Shepelev about the Conversation with Salnikov
Quest.Description: Go back to Shepelev and tell him that Salnikov is definitely not planning anything against him.

Quest.Title: Pass Shepelev's Message To The Pilot.
Quest.Description: You've been very helpful so Shepelev sllowed you to fly for 25 000. Tell the pilot about that.

Quest.Title: 25 000 Fee
Quest.Description: Pay Shepelev for his service (Talk to Salnikov).

Quest.Title: Looking for Secret Documents
Quest.Description: Salnikov asked you to get him the documents that must have been inside the crashed copter. It wrecked while flying over the Caravan territory.

Quest.Title: Looking for Secret Documents
Quest.Description: You should talk to a guide from Caravan first. He might know something about the crashed copter. You'll find him in square Б6-4.

Quest.Title: Ask Diogenes About The Crashed Copter
Quest.Description: The Guide said Diogenes had seen how the copter crashed. Talk to him. (Diogenes might be in the square Ж6-2).

Quest.Title: Getting Secret Documents
Quest.Description: Diogenes will give you the papers for 20 cans of stewed meat.

Quest.Title: Pass Secret Documents to Salnikov.
Quest.Description: Diogenes gave you the documents Salnikov has been looking for. Bring them to Salnikov.

Quest.Title: Microchips for Vetrichenko
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko promised to give you a note for the pilot at the Airport, which allows you to head for Tunguska or New Land for free. All he wants for that is 2 microchips taken out of the Impenetrable.

Quest.Title: Insulated Wires for Vetrichenko
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko promised to give you a note for the pilot at the Airport, which allows you to head for Tunguska or New Land for free. All he wants for that is 30 rolls of insulated wire.

Quest.Title: Note for the Pilot
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko gave you a note addressed to a pilot at the Airport. With this note the pilot must take you either to Tunguska or New Land free of charge.

Quest.Title: Copper Wire for Vetrichenko
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko promised to give you a note for the pilot at the Airport, which allows you to head for Tunguska or New Land for free. All he wants for that is 30 rolls of copper wire.

Quest.Title: Searching Shepelev's Sister
Quest.Description: Shepelev's looking for his sister, Zinaida Fadeevna. But it's in vain. He wants your help. Try talking to her ex-husnabd Mitya Cool first. He was last seen in the village (square Г-5).

Quest.Title: Looking for Shepelev's sister: Alcohol for Mitya Cool
Quest.Description: Mitya Cool seems to know where Zinaida is. He is ready to tell you that, if he gets 20 bottles of spirit.

Quest.Title: Looking for Shepelev's Sister: New Land
Quest.Description: Mitya Cool said Zinaida had been seen on New Land. Go there and try to learn more about her.

Quest.Title: Shepelev's Sister Search: A Bit Of A White Lie
Quest.Description: Zinaida Fadeevna asked you to tell Shepelev you did find her. Her son is missing and thought to be dead which can really hurt Shepelev. Shepelev's sister is really concerned about her brother state.

Quest.Title: Searching Shepelev's sister.
Quest.Description: Zinaida Fadeevna wants to find her son Arkasha. He set off for Tunguska and never came back. If he's safe and sound you can tell Shepelev that his sister has been found. Zinaida is concerned about her brother and she's sure he won't put up with his nephew's death. You have got to head for to Tunguska and talk to a local guide. He may remember Arkasha.

Quest.Title: Searching Shepelev's Sister
Quest.Description: Now you know that Arkasha's alive but he's hit the needle. You may find him in the square Д6 or Д7.

Quest.Title: Looking for Shepelev's sister: Meat for Arkasha Flybane
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane promises to hand a letter to his mom if you get him 20 slabs of fried meat. Unless you do that, Zinaida Fadeevna is not going to believe that her son is alive.

Quest.Title: Looking for Shepelev's sister: Toadstool Mushrooms for Arkasha Flybane
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane promises to hand a letter to his mom if you get him 30 toadstool mushrooms. Unless you do that, Zinaida Fadeevna is not going to believe that her son is alive.

Quest.Title: Looking for Shepelev's sister: Letter for Zinaida
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane handed a letter to his mother. Go to New Land and deliver the letter to Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Searching Shepelev's sister
Quest.Description: Tell Shepelev his sister is safe and sound. Pass him a package from her.

Quest.Title: Blueberry for Shepeleva
Quest.Description: Shepeleva will reduce the flight price if you bring her five "Blueberry".

Quest.Title: Cowberry for Shepeleva
Quest.Description: Shepeleva will reduce the flight price if you bring her five "Cowberry".

Quest.Title: Cranberry for Shepeleva
Quest.Description: Shepeleva will reduce the flight price if you bring her five "Cranberry".

Quest.Title: Message For The Pilot
Quest.Description: Deliver the message form Dispatcher to the pilot. It allows you to fly to the Airport for 5000.

Quest.Title: Arthur's Eleven
Quest.Description: Arthur asked you to wish his friends a happy New Year. Here's the list: Blacksmith, Kolya Acid, Sergeant Dibenko, Doctor Zinoviev, Courier, Sisyphus, Sanya the Old Coon, Fedya the Prophet, Prockhor, Misha the Hunter and Old Stalker. They all are in Liubech. Having done his will, come back and talk to Arthur again.
Wish Blacksmith a Happy New Year.
Wish Kolya Acid a Happy New Year.
Wish Sergeant Dibenko a Happy New Year.
Wish Doctor Zinoviev a Happy New Year.
Wish Courier a Happy New Year.
Wish Sisyphus a Happy New Year.
Wish Sanya the Old Coon a Happy New Year.
Wish Fedya the Prophet a Happy New Year.
Wish Prockhor a Happy New Year.
Wish Misha the Hunter a Happy New Year.
Wish Old Stalker a happy New Year.

Quest.Title: Riddle from Sanya The Old Coon
Firewood For Meat
Quest.Description: Chestnut will exchange some firewood for meat. One bundle of wood for three slabs of meat.

Quest.Title: Fireworks For Meat
Quest.Description: Chestnut will exchange fireworks for meat. 20-shot fireworks for 10 slabs of meat.

Quest.Title: Meat For Chestnut
Quest.Description: Bring Chestnut 5 slabs of meat. He'll cook 2 clabs for you, the rest of the meat he'll share with his fellows.

Quest.Title: Rounds For Meat
Quest.Description: The local Man (the one who buys ra tails near the station) will give you rounds for meat. A block of 9x18 rounds for 2 slabs of raw meat.

Quest.Title: 9х18 Rounds for Meat
Quest.Description: One local guy, that's hanging out by the station, will give you 9х18 rounds for 5 slabs of raw meat.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu
Quest.Description: According to Salnikov, Dersu left for the village in square В6. Talk to local stalkers and try to find out where he went next.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Favor for a Favor
Quest.Description: Siberian says he knows where Dersu went. In return for this information he wants you to get him 10 rolls of copper wire so that he could pay Vetrichenko for the plane ticket.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Talking to Mitya Cool
Quest.Description: Roma Siberian says Dersu was going to have a word with Mitya Cool. Mitya lives in a village, square Д-6.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Alcohol for Mitya Cool
Quest.Description: Mitya Cool seems to know something about Dersu, he will tell you what he knows if you get him 3 bottle of moonshine. One local guy at the Airport will help you to get those.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Caravan
Quest.Description: Mitya Cool says Dersu was heading for the Caravan. Go to the Caravan, talk to as many local people as you can, somebody must have seen him.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Talk to Dersu
Quest.Description: A Guide from the Caravan recommended that you talk to Diogenes. He says that Dersu often comes over to Diogenes's. Diogenes must be in square Ж6-2.

Quest.Title: Searching Dersu
Quest.Description: Diogenes said Dersu went to the wetlands (square АЖ3). Explore the area, Dersu may still be there.

Quest.Title: Looking for Dersu: Horrible Discovery
Quest.Description: Tell Salnikov about the body.

Quest.Title: Three Slabs of Meat for Alcohol
Quest.Description: A local, the one who can be found near the Airport, will sell a bottle of moonshine for three slabs of raw meat.

Quest.Title: Secret Base
Quest.Description: Salnikov asked you to head for Tunguska and find out as many facts as you can about the secret base. Try talking to a giude in the village called Radius (square В2-3.).

Quest.Title: Secret Base: Words with Arkasha Flybane
Quest.Description: The guide from "Radius" recommends that you have words with Arkasha Flybane, who knows way much more about Tunguska than other stalkers.

Quest.Title: Secret Base: Toadstool Mushrooms for Arkasha
Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane knows where the "Tesla Tower" and "Zarya" are. He will tell you the location if you get him 2 toadstool mushrooms.
You need to mark the location of theTesla Tower on the map. It's in square Г4. You must get there slong the gas pipeline in square В3-4.
Quest.onWin: The Tesla Tower if found.

Quest.Description: Arkasha Flybane mentioned about a stalker who told him about a secret base ofTunguska. You need to figure out who the name of that stalker. Akasha refuses to say the name, he wants two slabs of raw meat for that information.

Quest.Title: Secret Base: Gathering information
Quest.Description: Carry on gathering the infromation about the secret base. You need to find a bunker called "Zakat" and theTesla Tower. After that get two slabs of raw meat to Arkasha Flybane, he'll tell you who told him about the base.
Searching the Bunker. You need to mark the location of the bunker on the map. Arkasha Flybane told it's in square Ж7.
Quest.onWin: The Bunker is found.

Quest.Title: Secret Base: Conversation with Diogenes
Quest.Description: Arkasha told that Dersu went to see Diogenes. You need to talk to Diogenes and figure out if Dersu told him anything about the secret base of Tunguska. Diogenes lives in teh Caravan. His house is in square Ж6-2.

Quest.Title: Secret Base
Quest.Description: Diogenes has interesting theory of the Zone formation. It explains a lot, including the cause of developing secret base in Tunguska. Tell Salnikov everything you found out.

Quest.Title: Container
Quest.onWin: Added new item to the inventory - "Artifact Container".

Quest.Title: Find Leshich
Quest.Description: A Guide from New Land is looking for his friend named Leshich. He got lost when hunting and noone knows where he is. Try to look for him in the area called Caravan.

Quest.Title: Leshich Needs Fixing Up
Quest.Description: Leshich is severely ill. He needs your help. Collect the following ingredients for special decoction: 3 bottle of moonshine, 10 spider legs, 15 toadsrools, 20 bushes of cowberry, 15 hypericum inflorescences. Also Leshich asked you to get him TOZ-34 and "Light" cigarettes.
Leshich needs 3 bottles of moonshine for the decoction.
Jeshich needs 10 spider's legs to make decoction.
Leshich needs 15 toadstools for the decoction.
Leshich needs 20 bushes of cowberry for the decoction.

Quest.Title: Talk to the Guide on New Land
Quest.Description: Leshich turned out to be alive and he wants you to let his friend Vitya, a guide from New Land, knnow about that.

Quest.Title: Meat and Wood For Leshich
Quest.Description: Leshich is still weak. He still needs your help. Get him 10 slabs of raw meat and 3 bundles of wood.
Get Leshich 10 slabs of raw meat.
Get Leshich 3 bundles of wood.

Quest.Title: Поговорить с Шляпником на счет работы
Quest.Description: Лешичь предложил поработать на Шляпника из ДК, который в Любече. Надо встретиться с Шляпником и обсудить с ним детали работы.

Quest.Title: Mission from The Hatter: On The Way To The Jail
Quest.Description: Get into the Jail and pass along the message to Bugor. He'll tell what to do next.

Quest.Title: Mission From the Hatter: New Land
Quest.Description: Brugor sent you to New Land with a special mission. Find a pilot there and pass him Bugor's message.
The only weapon Leshich has is a sawed-off shotgun. Get him a TOZ-34 shotgun.

Quest.Title: Hunter's Gloves For Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich will give you his gloves for a bottle of balsam made by Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Hunting pants and Fishing Boots for Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich will give you hunting pants and fishing boots if you get him a bottle of balsam of Zinaida Fadeevna's own making.

Quest.Title: Hunter's Hat for Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich will give you his hat for a bottle of balsam made dy Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Hunter's Pants For Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich will give you hanter's pants for a bottle of balsam made by Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Hunting Vest for Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich is ready to give away his huntung vest in return for balsam made by Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Hunting Vest for Balsam
Quest.Description: Leshich is ready to give away his huntung vest in return for balsam made by Zinaida Fadeevna.

Quest.Title: Ingredients for Balsam
Quest.Description: Shepeleva agreed to make the balsam Leshich had asked for. Your mission is to get the ingredients needed. Although she is not sure she will make it, she promised to pay you with food for the ingredients anyway. Here is a list of the components: 5 daisy inflorescences, 3 plantain leaves, 2 hypericum inflorescences, 2 valerian inflorescences and a bottle of moonshine.
Shepeleva needs 10 bushes of blueberry to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs 5 pieces of moss to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs five camomile inflorescences to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs three plantain leaves to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs 2 Hypericum Inflorescences to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs 2 Valerian Inflorescences to make a balsam.
Shepeleva needs a bottle of moonshine to make a balsam.
Leshich asked you to get him 6 blocks of "Light" cigarettes.
Leshich needs 15 Hypericum Inflorescences for the decoction.

Quest.Title: Moonshine For Bugor
Quest.Description: Bugor will tell you where to get the "Scorpion" when you bring him 20 bottles of moonshine.

Quest.Title: Talk to a huckster
Quest.Description: According to Bugor, one dealer can help you to get the "Scorpion". He lives in a cave not far from Liubech.

Quest.Title: Vouchers for "Scorpion"
Quest.Description: The Dealer will try to get "Scorpion" for you if you get him 200 out-of-the-jail vouchers.

Quest.Title: Разрешение от Амир-бека
Quest.Description: Пилот сообщил, что вылететь с Макенджафа можно только с разрешения Амир-бека. Надо поговорить с Амир-беком и попытаться получить это разрешение.

Quest.Title: Elaborate Dinner
Quest.Description: Amirbek didn't accept the gift and he asked you to give it to the dogs.

Quest.Title: Paying for the Flight to Tunguska
Camel thorn
Quest.Description: Salah will give you a bottle of camel milk in exchange for ten roots of camel thorn.

Quest.Title: Fitting in
Quest.Description: Kill ten mutants outside Amirbek's tent and get him something as a trophy.

Quest.Title: Working for Farid
Quest.Description: Amirbek told you to do a job for Farid, oil worker who you'll find to the north from Amirbek's village.

Quest.Title: Metal Plates for Farid
Quest.Description: Farid will pay for metal plates.

Quest.Title: Soft Metal Plates for Farid.
Quest.Description: Farid will pay for soft metal plates.

Quest.Title: Steel Plates for Farid
Quest.Description: Farid will pay for steel plates.

Quest.Title: Screw-nuts For Farid
Quest.Description: Farid will pay you for large screw-nuts.

Quest.Title: Springs For Farid
Quest.Description: Farid will pay you for hard springs.

Quest.Title: Закрытый квест на детали для техника
Детали для техника с ГЭС
Quest.Description: Пилот попросил отнести детали технику на ГЭС. Техника зовут Сергей Иванович Обнинский. Найти его можно в машинном отделении ГЭС, в квадрате Е2-3.

Quest.Title: Wires for a Technician
Quest.Description: Sergei Obvinsky will buy insulated wires.

Quest.Title: Transformers for aTechnician
Quest.Description: Sergei Obvinsky will buy transformers.

Quest.Title: Electronic Parts for the Technician
Quest.Description: Sergey Obvinsky will buy electronic parts.

Quest.Title: The Return of the Prodigal Brother
Quest.Description: Vadim Stupka's brother, named Igor, got hooked on and took up with bandits. Breaking up with his wife, he wanted to escape from hi probelss and fled to the Zone. Vadim knows where to fing Igor and he asks to save his brother.
Talk to Shtaket. He knows where to find a man Igor Stupka is working for.
Talk to the Hog in bandits' cave near Liubech. You must find the way to free Igor.
Get the artifacts needed to buy out Igor Stupka.
Collect 5 "Screens"
Collect 5 "Pillows"
Go to the Caravan and talk to Igor Stupka. He'll be wating for you in the shed on a hill not far from the pond.
Hand Vadim Stupka the message from his brother.

Quest.Title: The Victory Day
Quest.Description: Old Stalker knows a lot about World War II (and many others as well). He'd like to check how well you know certain facts. He promises fireworks as a reward.
You've done well! Go back to Old Stalker for the reward.
Sergeant Dibenko will ask you next question.
Sanek the Old Coon knows a lot about the war. His granddad used to tell him many things. He'll asl you next question.
Basmach is a skilled soldier. He'll ask you next question.
Sergeant Drachuk will ask you next question.
Blacksmith is one of the "veterans" of the Zone. He's well respected and known amont the stalkers. He does know a lot about National History. If you wanna know facts, ask Blacksmith.
Misha the Hunter will ask you the last question. You almost did it!

Quest.Title: Wild Hunt: Stage 1
Quest.Description: Tackleberry declared war against the mutants of the Zone. He's looking for people who are ready to help him bring his plan to life by killing as many beasts as possible.
Filthy mutant blyaks are everywhere! Kill as many as you can. Bring their tongues as trophy.
Brutors threaten people all over the Zone. It's time to reap the bloody harvest.

Quest.Title: Wild Hunt: Stage 2
Quest.Description: There's no going back. The glove is thrown down. It's time for the next step.
Slow Fiends are another mysterious and horrible creatures that harbor on the Vesuvius. Bring their paws.
Sylvans are weird beings. You're about to face their aggression. Collect their hairs as trophy.

Quest.Title: Wild Hunt: Stage 3
Quest.Description: Open season on mutants is in Tunguska now, the lair for vicious creatures.
There is one more mutant species that you'll meet in Tunguska called Verliock. Kill as many as you can! Make it hot for them and bring their legs.
Jellies live in the swamps of Tunguska. Make them disapear forever.

Quest.Title: Wild Hunt: Peacemaker.
Quest.Description: Tacklberry mentioned the Colonel who he didn't recommend that you to talk to. However, you decided against it. You think Tacklberry is insane and it's time to put a stop to this horrible hunt.

Quest.Title: Wild Hunt: Final Stage
Quest.Description: You've done what Tacklberry had asked you to. There's the last final mission left. Let all burn!

Big Spider is a living legend of the Zone. It may be compared to a dragon itself, that's how big and terrifying it is. The Spider lives under the ground somewhere not far from Liubech. Kill it and bring 3 legs to prove the moster is dead.
Seeing Sages.... You must be the last thing they see before they die. Bring 30 medalions to prove they're dead.

Quest.Title: Wild Hut: Closing the season
Quest.Description: The colonel convinced you to stop the Wild Hunt. InformTackleberry that his plan has failed.

Quest.Title: Sisyphean labor
Quest.Description: Sisyphus promised to help you run a business. But first he wants you to get him Screen α and β artifacts (10 each) for that.
Get Sisyphus 10 Screen α artifacts.
Get Sisyphus 10 Screen β artifacts.

Quest.Title: Beasts for Beauty
Quest.Description: A successful cosmetic company uses mutant body parts as components for making beauty products.
Royal spider leg is unique biological material. Get 15 legs for the laboratory needs.
Peat bog spider is not of rare occurence. You need to get 15 legs of those.
Big Spider glands are unique, its ferments may influence other creatures of the same species, just like pheromones. A pair of big spider legs will definitely help cast a light upon that.

Quest.Title: Beasts for Beaties:Intermediary
Quest.Description: It seems that Doctor Flayer serves as an intermediary for the "Splendor" company. He's notorious for making experiments on animals. He will tell you what job you'll have to do.
You need to get some stupid blyak claws. Only God knows what that organization needs them for...

Quest.Title: Only for Your Eyes: Go-Betweener
Quest.Description: A man named Francois Garrel owns the "Fabulous" Museum. He's eager to have more rare and unique exibits in his collection. Stalker by the name Cockscrew supplies the goods to him.

Quest.Title: Только для ваших глаз.
Quest.Description: Вы согласились помочь Штопору предоставить экзотические экспонаты для галереи "Запределье". Теперь вам предстоит сафари по Зоне в поисках редких мутантов.
Голова большого (белого) медведя - такие чудовища не водятся вне Зоны, о, нет! Конечно же, она украсит сокровищницу любого эксцентричного коллекционера. А уж три - сделают ее неповторимой!
Вряд ли кто, особенно из тех людей, что не бывали в Зоне лично, способен отличить руку медленного беса от руки обычного или быстрого. Однако, спорить не будем, за эту музыку платит заказчик!

Если бы тевтонские рыцари умели плавать, точно рыбы, и прибавили бы в весе и росте - вышли бы как раз панцирные верлиоки. Хищные создания представляют интерес, и, конечно, приобретут определенную популярность. Частично.
На Новой Земле водятся полярные собаки-мутанты. Вам требуется собрать их челюсти. Интересно, что за болезненная фантазия у этих чучельников, ранее, вероятно, работавших над фильмом "Нечто"?

Quest.Title: Grim Genius: Intermediary
Quest.Description: The "Teminus Ultima" works beyond good and evil, providing services for anyone who is not really bothered with ethical and moral standards. However, genius aren't like everybody else. Go to New Land and find Vitya for further instructions.

Quest.Title: Genius
Quest.Description: People who work for "Terminus Ultima" need artifacts for their scientific experiments and researches. Collecting artifacts is a dangerous mission but they promise a decent reward for that job.
Collect 5 "Shell β" arts.
Scientists know what they want. Get them 2 "Vesuvius" arts.
10 Stabilizer α arts must be delivered to the "Terminus Ultima" lab.
Antigrav α is the last thing you nees to find.

Quest.Title: Dirty Pigs.
Quest.Description: Ahmed asked you to kill some boars nearby.
Collect 5 Pillows ά
Convince Krasnov to tell you everything about the "Door" project. Moreover it's in his interest.
Riddle №1
Riddle №2
Riddle №3
Riddle №4
Riddle №5
Riddle №6
Riddle №7
Riddle №8
Riddle №9
Riddle №10
Riddle №11
Riddle №12
Riddle №13
Riddle №14
Riddle №15
Riddle №16
Riddle №17
Riddle №18
Riddle №19
Riddle №20

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Signal Booster for Morse
Quest.Description: Tesla is ready to help. But first you have to provide him with tools and stuff he needs.
Collect 20 radio parts.
Collect 5 repair kits.

Quest.Title: Dossonance: Signal Booster for Morse
Quest.Description: Tesla made the signal booster Morse needs. However Tesla is sure it's useless due to communication failure caused by anomalies. Anyway, bring the booster to Morse.
Collect 20 bimetal plates.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Vox Unius, Vox Nullius
Quest.Description: Unfortunately, Tesla can't help you. He recommends that you turn to professor Chereshnikov, who must know how to help Morse.

Quest.Title: Three Barrels.
Quest.Description: Mokruch needs three AK-47 barrels. When he gets what he wants he'll be ready to carry on talking.
Collect tansy flowers for Timokha.
Collect toadstools for Timokha. The mushroom can be either helpful or poisonous.

Quest.Title: Riddle For Rounds
Quest.Description: Trapper will propose a riddle when you give him some rounds.

Quest.Title: Riddle Collector
Quest.Description: Reddy is bored to death here so he has an unusual mission for you. He's collecting interesting riddles so he wants to find out what riddles people in the Zone know. Talk to as many people as you can and collect at least 10 riddles. Reddy will pay you well.

Quest.Title: Arguments and Facts
Quest.Description: Flybane asked you to hand Shtacket a letter from the White.
Collect 10 Hypericum Inflorescences.
Bring to Fedor 3 energy drinks.

Quest.Title: Getting cold...
Quest.Description: Fedor needs to warm up a bit. He asks you to get him an energy drink.

Quest.Title: Hypericum Inflorescences
Quest.Description: The Hatter needs 10 Hypericum Inflorescences.
Bring Ivy the Bartender a bolt for Desert Eagle.

Quest.Title: Cold Hands
Quest.Description: Seletkevich from New Land wants you to bring him 2 fiend paws that he's going to use in his experiments.
Collect Fiend's paws for Seletkevich.
Collect 12 polar dog jaws.

Quest.Title: Профпригодность.
Quest.Description: Оскар Бернштейн, ученый, просит вас принести ему ряд артефактов. То, как вы справитесь с работой, позволит ему решить, работать с вами дальше или же прекратить отношения. Постарайтесь не умереть.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Drawings for Tesla
Quest.Description: Morse has picked up a signal, which sounded like a voice. That voice seems to be able to affect people's minds. Morse wants to learn more about the voice and that's why he's going to improve the radio station. Your task is to deliver Morse's drawings to Kolya Tesla.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Affected
Quest.Description: You listened to the Voice Morse had told you about and now you feel its psionic impact.You're heavily injured: your whole body is aching, your nose and ears are bleeding. The state of your consciousness is altered.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Vile Donum
Quest.Description: Morse asks you to help him collect all components needed for assembling a device that will let him talk to the Voice. That device will lead people to the truth.
A lot of different radio parts are needed for making a very special device. Get those components by all means.
Morse needs a lot of electrical parts. Get them.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Vox Stentorea
Quest.Description: Morse needs a lot of unusual components for assembling a etransmitter. Your task is to provide him with everything.
Morse needs some seeing sages' medalions. He's certain they can help him transmit a signal properly.
Wires are an essential part of any technical equipment.
A "Screen" artifact will also be used as a part of the device Morse is trying to assemble.
Morse needs copper wire.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Vox Dei
Quest.Description: You can hear me and you are strong enough to listen. You are unique. I need to get stronger. I need something to fill my essence with. Pain. Fear. Rage. You can give me what I want. I will reward you generously, be sure. Kill as many mutants and animals as you can. Their emotions are much more pure than human's, As soon as you grant my wish, I will leave you alone for some time. But I am going to watch you.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Vox Populi
Quest.Description: You refused to listen to the Voice, which, obviously, drives Morse crazy. You decided to find the way to make this dangerous experiment stop.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Eremita
Quest.Description: Chereshnikov has an idea how to help Morse. First thing he wants you to do is to find Timokha the Hermit and ask him to make a special psychoactive drug.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Ad Usum Internum
Quest.Description: Timokha the Hermit will give you a psychotropic drug of his own making. It must help fix Morse up and free him from teh chains of the Voice.
Collect some death cap mushrooms for Timohka. These poisonous mushroom is one of the main ingredients of the "bad luck" potion.
Finds a macrotyphula mushroom for Timokha.
Соберите аир болотный для Тимохи. Как ни странно, аир широко применяется в том числе в народной медицине и выделяется из всего списка.

Quest.Title: Диссонанс: Exoriare Ultor
Quest.Description: Вы получили препарат от Тимохи. Теперь время для решительного броска. Черешников обещал придумать способ, как вывести из строя устройство Морзе. Вам нужно поговорить с ним перед финальным шагом.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Silentium!
Quest.Description: Now you have everything to help Morse out. It is to be hoped it's going to work out. Nothing venture nothing have. Make the Voice stop.

Quest.Title: Dissonance: Silentium est aurum
Quest.Description: You did your best to help Morze out and it seems you succeeded. Morze is alive and the transmission has been stopped. Talk to Morze and check if he is alright.
Blyak is a funny name for a monster. Kill some.
Sages. They're emotionally unstable I'm dissociating and getting the whole empathic spectrum. Stay cool while killing them.
Bears. I want more dead bears.

Quest.Title: Дай лапу!
Quest.Description: Ватман хочет, чтобы вы принесли ему десять лап верлиок для сдачи на опыты в лагерь "Эгида". Это поможет сократить его вахту в заброшенном доме на отшибе, где и правда, жутковато!

Quest.Title: Checking Power Transmission Lines
Quest.Description: Nichiporenko asks you to ckeck electrical boxes of the power transmicssion lines. He promised to cleanse your karma when you're back.

Quest.Title: Самую малость...
Quest.Description: Игорю не хватает нескольких артефактов для сдачи своему начальнику. Если вы поможете ему, он готов рассказать загадку. Соберите пять подушек-альфа!

Quest.Title: Strawberry for Diogenes
Quest.Description: Diogenes asked you to get him some strawberry.

Quest.Title: Supplier
Quest.Description: The Foreman needs repair kits and acetone peroxide. He asked you to get him those.
Find 5 repair kits for the foreman.
Get 5 bottles of acetone peroxide.

Quest.Title: Controlling Mutant Population
Quest.Description: Kill at least a dozen of mutated dogs. Get their jaws to prove you dealled with them.

Quest.Title: Good Intentions
Quest.Description: Yuriy wants you to threaten Bald a little.

Quest.Title: Kick Diplomacy
Quest.Description: Get back to Dirty Yurij and tell him how the talks with the Bald went.

Quest.Title: Eagle Bolt
Quest.Description: Ivy bought a Desert Eagle, which sadly got broken. He asks you to get a bolt to the weapon.

Quest.Title: Oil Cans
Quest.Description: Stupka asked you to get him 5 oil cans.

Quest.Title: Просто для запаха!
Quest.Description: Принести Тимохе 5 пижмы и 10 древесных грибов.
Собрать древенсый гриб для Тимохи.

Quest.Title: Iron Man
Quest.Description: Vetrichenko runs the airport all alone. He asks you to help him.
Electrical components are needed to fix the equipment in the airport.
Vetrichenko is working himself to death. He needs a nerve stimulator to carry on.
Tell Nechiporenko you checked all the power line towers.

Quest.Title: Checking Power Lines
Quest.Description: Check 10 power line towers.
Проверить питание на первой вышке
Проверить питание на второй вышке
Проверить питание на третьей вышке
Проверить четвертую вышку
Проверить пятую вышку
Проверить шестую вышку
Проверить седьмую вышку
Проверить восьмую вышку
Проверить девятую вышку
Check the last power line tower.

Quest.Title: Проверка сети ЛЭП
Quest.Description: Прапорщик Осадчий попросил проверить электрощитки линий электропередач неподалеку. Обещал улучшить карму в случае выполнения.

Quest.Title: Проверка сетей ЛЭП
Quest.Description: Проверить 10 вышек электропередач
Проверить питание на первой вышке
Проверить питание на второй вышке
Проверить питание на третьей вышке
Проверить четвертую вышку
Проверить пятую вышку
Проверить шестую вышку
Проверить седьмую вышку
Проверить восьмую вышку
Проверить девятую вышку
Проверить десятую вышку
Tell Osadchiy you cheked all the towers.
Соберите 5 экранов-бета.
Вы не справились с заданием. Вы самое слабое звено. Прощайте.

Quest.Title: Ультиматум
Quest.Description: Передайте посылки, которые вручил вам Оскар Бернштейн, доктору Шерстнову и доценту Краснову. Постарайтесь затем узнать от них все, что возможно, о проекте "Дверь". Возможно, содержимое посылок поможет им вести конструктивный диалог.
Передайте посылку доктору Шерстнову на Новой Земле и вытрясите из него информацию!
Передайте посылку доценту Краснову в лагере "Эгида". Все, что он знает о проекте, должны узнать и вы.
Collect 10 verliock legs.
Collect 5 screens α artifacts.
Collect 5 oil cans.
Get Trapper 3 packs of 12/76 0000 rounds.

Quest.Title: Дипломатия канонерок
Quest.Description: Вы умеете словами надавить так, что лучше бы били ногами по лицу - не настолько больно и неприятно. Используйте это оружие при беседе с доцентом Красновым и Дмитрием Шерстновым. Пропустите их через вербальные жернова и узнайте все о проекте "Дверь".
Вы в силах тяжких. Обрушьте их на Краснова, чтобы он и думать забыл о защите.
